anya-e0809n0:29_0: Bhiyyo rūpantarā sāha, cariyena ca katthaci;
anya-e0809n0:35_0: Pumitthiyaṃ padaṃ dvīsu, sabbaliṅge ca tīsviti;
anya-e0809n0:38_0: Bhiyyo payoga māgamma, sogate āgame kvaci;
anya-e0809n0:52_0: Jino, sakko tu siddhattho, suddhodani ca gotamo.
anya-e0809n0:54_0: Sakyasīho tathā sakya, muni cādiccabandhu ca;
anya-e0809n0:56_0: Mokkho nirodho nibbānaṃ, dīpo taṇhakkhayo paraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:57_0: Tāṇaṃ leṇa marūpañca, santaṃ sacca manālayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:64_0: Dukkhakkhayo byābajjhañca byāpajjaṃ (ṭīkā), vivaṭṭaṃ khema kevalaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:65_0: Apavaggo virāgo ca, paṇīta maccutaṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:67_0: Yogakkhemo pāra mapi, mutti santi visuddhiyo;
anya-e0809n0:70_0: Khīṇāsavo tva’sekkho ca, vītarāgo tathā’ rahā;
anya-e0809n0:74_0: Tidasā tva’marā devā, vibudhā ca sudhāsino;
anya-e0809n0:75_0: Surā marū divokā cā, matapā saggavāsino.
anya-e0809n0:77_0: Nijjarā’ nimisā dibbā, apume devatāni ca devatā eva devatāni, sakatthe nipaccayo (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n0:79_0: Siddho bhūto ca gandhabbo, guyhako yakkha rakkhasā;
anya-e0809n0:88_0: Vāsudevo hari harī (ṭīkā) kaṇho, kesavo cakkapāṇya’tha;
anya-e0809n0:91_0: Haro vutto kumāro tu, khandho sattidharo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:93_0: Sakko purindado deva, rājā vajirapāṇi ca;
anya-e0809n0:97_0: Suranātho ca vajira, hattho ca bhūtapatya’pi.
anya-e0809n0:100_0: Viḍojo tha sujā tassa sujātā’ssa (ṭīkā), bhariyā tha puraṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:102_0: Masakkasārā masakkasāro (sī.) vassoka, sārā cevā’ marāvatī;
anya-e0809n0:108_0: Erāvaṇo gajo paṇḍu, kambalo tu silāsanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:111_0: Nandanaṃ missakaṃ citta, latā phārusakaṃ vanā.
anya-e0809n0:117_0: Vimāno nitthiyaṃ byamhaṃ, pīyūsaṃ tvamataṃ sudhā;
anya-e0809n0:118_0: Sineru meru tidivā, dhāro neru sumeru ca.
anya-e0809n0:126_0: Kapparukkho tu santānā, dayo devaddumā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:128_0: Pācī patījhu’ dīci’tthī, pubba pacchima uttarā;
anya-e0809n0:131_0: Erāvato erāvaṇo (sī.), amarakose pana erāvato eva atthi puṇḍarīko, vāmano kumudo’ ñjano;
anya-e0809n0:134_0: Dhataraṭṭho ca gandhabbā, dhipo, kumbhaṇḍasāmi tu;
anya-e0809n0:138_0: Aḷakā alakā (amarakosa) ḷakamandāssa, purī, paharaṇaṃ gadā;
anya-e0809n0:141_0: Jātavedo sikhī joti, pāvako dahano’ nalo;
anya-e0809n0:142_0: Hutāvaho’ ccimā dhūma, ketva’ggi gini bhānumā.
anya-e0809n0:144_0: Tejo dhūmasikho vāyu, sakho ca kaṇhavattanī;
anya-e0809n0:149_0: Kukkuḷo tu’ṇhabhasmasmi, maṅgāro’lāta mummukaṃ tikaṃ dittakaṭṭhādindhane (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n0:155_0: Gandhavāho tathā vāyo, samīro ca sadāgati.
anya-e0809n0:157_0: Vāyubhedā ime chu’ddha, ṅgamo cādhogamo tathā;
anya-e0809n0:163_0: Vego javo rayo khippaṃ, tu sīghaṃ turitaṃ lahu;
anya-e0809n0:164_0: Āsu tuṇṇa maraṃ cāvi, lambitaṃ tuvaṭaṃpi ca.
anya-e0809n0:166_0: Satataṃ nicca maviratā, nārata santata manavaratañca dhuvaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:167_0: Bhusa matisayo ca daḷhaṃ, tibbe’kantā’timatta, bāḷhāni;
anya-e0809n0:168_0: Khippādī paṇḍake dabbe, dabbagā tesu ye tisu.
anya-e0809n0:170_0: Aviggaho tu kāmo ca, manobhū madano bhave;
anya-e0809n0:171_0: Antako vasavattī ca, pāpimā ca pajāpati.
anya-e0809n0:173_0: Pamattabandhu kaṇho ca, māro namuci, tassa tu;
anya-e0809n0:174_0: Taṇhā’ratī ragā dhītū, hatthī tu girimekhalo.
anya-e0809n0:177_0: Vepacitti pulomo ca, kimpuriso tu kinnaro.
anya-e0809n0:188_0: Abbhaṃ tīsvatha vassañca, vassanaṃ vuṭṭhi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:191_0: Meghanāde tu dhanitaṃ, gajjitaṃ rasitādi ca;
anya-e0809n0:199_0: Indu cando ca nakkhatta, rājā somo nisākaro.
anya-e0809n0:202_0: Sītaraṃsi nisānātho, uḷurājā ca mā pume.
anya-e0809n0:204_0: Kalā soḷasamo bhāgo, bimbaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:205_0: Aḍḍho tvaddho upaḍḍho ca, vā khaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ pume.
anya-e0809n0:207_0: Addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge, pasādo tu pasannatā;
anya-e0809n0:208_0: Komudī candikā juṇhā, kanti sobhā juti cchavi.
anya-e0809n0:211_0: Cihanaṃ cāpi sobhā tu, paramā susamā tha ca.
anya-e0809n0:213_0: Sītaṃ guṇe, guṇiliṅgā, sīta sisira sītalā;
anya-e0809n0:214_0: Himaṃ tuhina mussāvo, nīhāro mahikā pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:216_0: Nakkhattaṃ joti bhaṃ tārā, apume tārako’ḷu ca;
anya-e0809n0:219_0: Migasira magasira (sī.) maddā ca punabbasu, phusso pusso (ṭī.) cāsilesa’pi.
anya-e0809n0:221_0: Māghā magha (sī.) ca phaggunī dve ca, hatthā cittā ca svātipi;
anya-e0809n0:222_0: Visākhā’ nurādhā jeṭṭhā, mūlā’ sāḷhā duve tathā.
anya-e0809n0:224_0: Savaṇo ca dhaniṭṭhā ca, satabhisajo pubbu’ttarabhaddapadā;
anya-e0809n0:227_0: Sobbhānu kathito rāhu, sūrādī tu navaggahā;
anya-e0809n0:228_0: Rāsi mesādiko bhadda, padā poṭṭhapadā samā.
anya-e0809n0:234_0: Raṃsimā bhākaro bhānu, akko sahassaraṃsi ca.
anya-e0809n0:236_0: Raṃsi ābhā pabhā ditti, ruci bhā juti dīdhiti;
anya-e0809n0:237_0: Marīci dvīsu bhānvaṃ’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo.
anya-e0809n0:249_0: Dasa khaṇamuhutto te, divaso tu ahaṃ dinaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:255_0: Nisā ca rajanī ratti, tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave;
anya-e0809n0:259_0: Andhakāro tamo nitthī, timisaṃ timiraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:262_0: Vanasaṇḍo ghano megha, paṭalaṃ cā’ḍḍharatti ca.
anya-e0809n0:265_0: Pāṭipado tu dutiyā, tatiyādī tithī tithi, tāyati pāletīti tithi, tā+iti (ṇvādi) dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:270_0: Ghaṭikā saṭṭhya’ horatto, pakkho te dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0809n0:274_0: Citto vesākha, jeṭṭho cā, sāḷho dvīsu ca sāvaṇo;
anya-e0809n0:277_0: Māgasiro tathā phusso, kamena māgha phagguṇā;
anya-e0809n0:284_0: Kamā hemanta gimhāna, vassānā utuyo dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:287_0: Cha vā vasanto ca gimha vassānā;
anya-e0809n0:288_0: Saradoti kamā māsā, dve dve vuttānusārena.
anya-e0809n0:295_0: Vassa saṃvaccharā nitthī, sarado hāyano samā.
anya-e0809n0:297_0: Kappakkhayo tu saṃvaṭṭo, yuganta palayā api;
anya-e0809n0:302_0: Pāpañca kibbisaṃ verā, ghaṃ duccarita dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:305_0: Kusalaṃ sukataṃ sukkaṃ, puññaṃ dhamma manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:312_0: Hāso’ ttamanatā pīti, vitti tuṭṭhi ca nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:315_0: Pāmojjañca pamodo tha, sukhaṃ sātañca phāsva’tha;
anya-e0809n0:316_0: Bhaddaṃ seyyo subhaṃ khemaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:318_0: Dukkhañca kasiraṃ kicchaṃ, nīgho ca byasanaṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:319_0: Dabbe tu pāpapuññāni, tīsvākicchaṃ sukhādi ca.
anya-e0809n0:321_0: Bhāgyaṃ niyati bhāgo ca, bhāgadheyyaṃ vidhī’rito;
anya-e0809n0:322_0: Atho uppatti nibbatti, jāti janana mubbhavo.
anya-e0809n0:324_0: Nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, padaṃ bījaṃ nibandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:325_0: Nidānaṃ pabhavo hetu, sambhavo setu paccayo.
anya-e0809n0:327_0: Kāraṇaṃ yaṃ samāsannaṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n0:328_0: Jīvo tu puriso’ttā tha, padhānaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:330_0: Pāṇo sarīrī bhūtaṃ vā, satto dehī ca puggalo;
anya-e0809n0:334_0: Rūpaṃ saddo gandha rasā, phasso dhammo ca gocarā;
anya-e0809n0:335_0: Ālambā visayā te chā, rammaṇā lambaṇāni ca.
anya-e0809n0:351_0: Kaḷāro kapilo nīla, pīte tha rocanappabhe;
anya-e0809n0:352_0: Piṅgo pisaṅgo pyathavā, kaḷārādī tu piṅgale.
anya-e0809n0:358_0: Naccaṃ naṭṭañca naṭanaṃ, nattanaṃ lāsanaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:359_0: Naccaṃ tu vāditaṃ gīta, miti nāṭumidaṃ tayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:364_0: Siṅgāro karuṇo vīra, bbhuta hassa bhayānakā;
anya-e0809n0:365_0: Santo bībhaccha ruddāni, nava nāṭyarasā ime.
anya-e0809n0:367_0: Posassa nāriyaṃ pose, itthiyā saṅgamaṃ pati;
anya-e0809n0:374_0: Bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ bhāsā, vohāro vacanaṃ vaco;
anya-e0809n0:375_0: Utti vācā girā vāṇī, bhāratī kathitā kathā (katthaci) vacī.
anya-e0809n0:381_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho.
anya-e0809n0:383_0: Iru nārī yaju sāma, miti vedā tayo siyuṃ;
anya-e0809n0:384_0: Ete eva tayī nārī, vedo manto sutitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:386_0: Aṭṭhako vāmako vāma, devo caṅgīraso bhagu;
anya-e0809n0:387_0: Yamadaggi ca vāsiṭṭho, bhāradvājo ca kassapo;
anya-e0809n0:390_0: Kappo byākaraṇaṃ joti, satthaṃ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e0809n0:396_0: Vitaṇḍasatthaṃ viññeyyaṃ, yaṃ taṃ lokāyataṃ iti;
anya-e0809n0:397_0: Keṭubhaṃ tu kriyākappa, vikappo kavinaṃ hito.
anya-e0809n0:402_0: Saññā, khyā, vhā samaññā cā, bhidhānaṃ nāma mavhayo;
anya-e0809n0:405_0: Pañho tīsva nuyogo ca, pucchā pyatha nidassanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:408_0: Samā saṅkhepa saṃhārā, samāso saṅgaho pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:411_0: Vohāro tu vivādo tha, sapanaṃ sapathopi ca;
anya-e0809n0:416_0: Katthanā ca silāghā ca, vaṇṇanā ca nuti tthuti.
anya-e0809n0:418_0: Thomanañca thomanaṃ vā (katthaci thomanaṃ thomanā dviliṅge) pasaṃsātha, kekā nādo sikhaṇḍinaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:422_0: Pariyāyo vevacanaṃ, sākacchā tu ca saṃkathā;
anya-e0809n0:426_0: Khepo nindā tathā kucchā, jigucchā garahā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:443_0: Vitathaṃ tu musā cātha āhataṃ tu musātthakaṃ (katthaci, amarakose), pharusādī tiliṅgikā.
anya-e0809n0:445_0: Sammā byayañcā vitathaṃ, saccaṃ tacchaṃ yathātathaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:446_0: Tabbantā tīsva līkaṃ tva, saccaṃ micchā musā byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:454_0: Bindu gambhīra ninnādī, tyeva maṭṭhaṅgiko saro.
anya-e0809n0:460_0: Sarā satta tayo gāmā, cekavīsati mucchanā;
anya-e0809n0:463_0: Usabho dhevato ceva, chajja gandhāra majjhimā;
anya-e0809n0:464_0: Pañcamo ca nisādoti, satte’te gaditā sarā.
anya-e0809n0:466_0: Nadanti usabhaṃ gāvo, turagā dhevataṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:467_0: Chajjaṃ mayūrā gandhāra, majā koñcā ca majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:473_0: Saresu tesu pacceke, tisso tisso hi mucchanā;
anya-e0809n0:474_0: Siyuṃ tatheva tānāni ṭhānāni (bahūsu), satta satteva labbhare.
anya-e0809n0:476_0: Tisso duve catasso ca, catasso kamato sare;
anya-e0809n0:477_0: Tisso duve catassoti, dvāvīsati sutī siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:479_0: Uccatare rave tāro, thābyatte madhure kalo;
anya-e0809n0:480_0: Gambhīre tu rave mando, tārādī tīsvatho kale;
anya-e0809n0:484_0: Vīṇā ca vallakī satta, tantī sā parivādinī;
anya-e0809n0:498_0: Ātojjaṃ tu ca vādittaṃ, vāditaṃ vajja muccate.
anya-e0809n0:509_0: So tvā modo dūragāmī, vissantā tīsvito paraṃ.
anya-e0809n0:511_0: Iṭṭhagandho ca surabhi, sugandho ca sugandhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:512_0: Pūtigandhi tu duggandho, tha vissaṃ āmagandhi yaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:517_0: Kasāvo nitthiyaṃ titto, madhuro lavaṇo ime;
anya-e0809n0:518_0: Ambilo kaṭuko ceti, cha rasā tabbatī tisu.
anya-e0809n0:522_0: Nayanaṃ tvakkhi nettañca, locanaṃ ca’cchi cakkhu ca.
anya-e0809n0:524_0: Sotaṃ saddaggaho kaṇṇo, savanaṃ suti natthu tu;
anya-e0809n0:525_0: Nāsā ca nāsikā ghānaṃ, jivhātu rasanā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:527_0: Sarīraṃ vapu gattañcā, ttabhāvo bondi viggaho;
anya-e0809n0:528_0: Dehaṃ vā purise kāyo, thiyaṃ tanu kaḷevaraṃ.
anya-e0809n0:530_0: Cittaṃ ceto mano nitthī, viññāṇaṃ hadayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:531_0: Mānasaṃ dhī tu paññā ca, buddhi medhā mati muti.
anya-e0809n0:533_0: Bhūrī mantā ca paññāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vijjā ca yoni ca;
anya-e0809n0:537_0: Sampajaññaṃ tu nepakkaṃ, vedayitaṃ tu vedanā.
anya-e0809n0:541_0: Ekaggatā tu samatho, avikkhepo samādhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:543_0: Ussāhā’ tappa paggāhā, vāyāmo ca parakkamo;
anya-e0809n0:544_0: Padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ cehā, uyyāmo ca dhiti tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:549_0: Ussoḷhī tva dhimattehā, sati tva nussati tthiya;
anya-e0809n0:550_0: Lajjā hirī samānā tha, ottappaṃ pāpabhīrutā.
anya-e0809n0:556_0: Dayā’ nukampā kāruññaṃ, karuṇā ca anuddayā;
anya-e0809n0:557_0: Thiyaṃ veramaṇī ceva, viratyā’ rati cāpyatha.
anya-e0809n0:559_0: Titikkhā khanti khamanaṃ, khamā mettā tu metya’tha;
anya-e0809n0:560_0: Dassanaṃ diṭṭhi laddhitthī, siddhanto samayo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:562_0: Taṇhā ca tasiṇā ejā, jālinī ca visattikā;
anya-e0809n0:563_0: Chando jaṭā nikantyā’sā, sibbinī bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0809n0:565_0: Abhijjhā vanatho vānaṃ, lobho rāgo ca ālayo;
anya-e0809n0:566_0: Pihā manoratho icchā, bhilāso kāma dohaḷā;
anya-e0809n0:567_0: Ākaṅkhā ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:569_0: Veraṃ virodho viddeso, doso ca paṭighañca vā;
anya-e0809n0:573_0: Baddhavera mupanāho, siyā soko tu socanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:576_0: Bhītitthi bhaya muttāso, bheravaṃ tu mahabbhayaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:579_0: Ghoraṃ paṭibhayaṃ bhesmaṃ, bhayaṅkara mime tīsu.
anya-e0809n0:581_0: Issā usūyā maccheraṃ, tu macchariya maccharaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:582_0: Moho’vijjā tathā’ñāṇaṃ, māno vidhā ca unnati.
anya-e0809n0:584_0: Uddhacca muddhaṭaṃ cātha uddhavaṃuddhaṃ dhāvati citta metenāti uddhavaṃ (ṭīkā),
anya-e0809n0:588_0: Dveḷhakaṃ vicikicchā ca, kaṅkhā saṅkā vimatyapi.
anya-e0809n0:591_0: Nicchayo niṇṇayo vutto, paṭiññā tu paṭissavo.
anya-e0809n0:594_0: Parābhavo pya’ vaññā tha, ummādo cittavibbhamo.
anya-e0809n0:596_0: Pemaṃ sineho sneho tha, cittapīḷā visaññitā;
anya-e0809n0:599_0: Vilāso lalitaṃ līlā, hāvo heḷā ca vibbhamo;
anya-e0809n0:602_0: Hasanaṃ hasitaṃ hāso, mando so mihitaṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:606_0: Parihāso davo khiḍḍā, keḷi kīḷā ca kīḷitaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:607_0: Niddā tu supinaṃ soppaṃ, middhañca pacalāyikā.
anya-e0809n0:609_0: Thiyaṃ nikati kūṭañca, dambho sāṭhyañca ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:610_0: Sabhāvo tu nissaggo ca, sarūpaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:621_0: Vaggā bhūmi, purī, macca, catubbaṇṇa, vanādihi;
anya-e0809n0:624_0: Vasundharā chamā bhūmi, pathavī medanī mahī;
anya-e0809n0:625_0: Ubbī vasumatī go ku, vasudhā dharaṇī dharā;
anya-e0809n0:626_0: Puthavī jagatī bhūrī, bhū ca bhūtadharā’ vanī.
anya-e0809n0:628_0: Khārā tu mattikā ūso, ūsavā tūsaro tisu;
anya-e0809n0:634_0: Pumbahutte kurū sakkā, kosalā magadhā sivī;
anya-e0809n0:637_0: Vaṅgā videhā kambojā, maddā bhagga’ṅga sīhaḷā;
anya-e0809n0:640_0: Loko ca bhuvanaṃ vuttaṃ, deso tu visayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:644_0: Saddalo harite dese, tiṇenā, bhinavena hi.
anya-e0809n0:651_0: Raṭṭhaṃ tu vijitañcātha, purise setu āliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:653_0: Upāntabhū parisaro, goṭṭhaṃ tu gokulaṃ vajo;
anya-e0809n0:654_0: Maggo pantho patho addhā, añjasaṃ vaṭumaṃ tathā.
anya-e0809n0:656_0: Pajjo pajjā…. (ka.), yanañca padavī, vattanī paddhatitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:657_0: Tabbhedā jaṅgha, sakaṭa, maggā te ca mahaddhani.
anya-e0809n0:662_0: Suppatho tu supantho ca, uppathaṃ tvapathaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:664_0: Chattiṃsaparamāṇūna, meko ṇu ca chattiṃsa te;
anya-e0809n0:665_0: Tajjārī tāpi chattiṃsa, rathareṇu chattiṃsa te.
anya-e0809n0:667_0: Likkhātā satta ūkā tā, dhaññamāsoti satta te;
anya-e0809n0:668_0: Satta ṅgula’ mamu dviccha, vidatthi tā duve siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:670_0: Ratanaṃ tāni satteva, yaṭṭhi tā vīsatū sabhaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:679_0: Puraṃ nagara mitthī vā, ṭhānīyaṃ puṭabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:680_0: Thiyaṃ tu rājadhānī rājaṭhānī (ṭī.) ca, khandhāvāro bhave tha ca.
anya-e0809n0:682_0: Sākhānagara maññatra, yaṃ taṃ mūlapurā puraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:683_0: Bārāṇasī ca sāvatthi, vesālī mithilā, ḷavī.
anya-e0809n0:685_0: Kosambu, jjeniyo takka, silā campā ca sāgalaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:686_0: Susumāragiraṃ saṃsumāra (ṭīkā) rāja, gahaṃ kapilavatthu ca.
anya-e0809n0:691_0: Racchā ca visikhā vuttā, rathikā vīthi cāpyatha;
anya-e0809n0:692_0: Byūho racchā anibbiddhā, nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:694_0: Catukkaṃ caccare magga, sandhi siṅghāṭakaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:695_0: Pākāro varaṇo cātha, udāpo uddāpa, uddāpa upakārikā.
anya-e0809n0:697_0: Kuṭṭaṃ tu bhitti nārī tha, gopuraṃ dvārakoṭṭhako;
anya-e0809n0:698_0: Esikā indakhīlo ca, aṭṭo tvaṭṭālako bhave.
anya-e0809n0:700_0: Toraṇaṃ tu bahidvāraṃ, parikhātu ca dīghikā;
anya-e0809n0:701_0: Mandiraṃ sadanā, gāraṃ, nikāyo nilayā, layo.
anya-e0809n0:706_0: Okaṃ sālā khayo vāso, thiyaṃ kuṭi vasatya’pi;
anya-e0809n0:707_0: Gehañcā, nitthi sadumaṃ, cetiyā, yatanāni tu.
anya-e0809n0:709_0: Pāsādo ceva yūpo tha, muṇḍacchado ca hammiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:716_0: Sabhāyañca sabhā cātha, maṇḍapaṃ vā janālayo;
anya-e0809n0:729_0: Gabbho ovarako vāsā, gāraṃ tu sayaniggahaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:731_0: Itthāgāraṃ tu orodho, suddhanto’ ntepurampi ca;
anya-e0809n0:738_0: Ālokasandhi vutto tha, laṅgī’tthī paligho bhave;
anya-e0809n0:741_0: Chadanaṃ paṭalaṃ chadda, majiraṃ caccaro, ṅgaṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:744_0: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṃ dvāra, bāhā kūṭaṃ tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n0:745_0: Dvārañca paṭihāro tha, ummāro dehanī, tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:747_0: Eḷako indakhīlo tha, thambho thūṇo pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:748_0: Pāṭikā, ḍḍhendupāsāṇe, giñjakā tu ca iṭṭhakā.
anya-e0809n0:756_0: Saṅghāto pakkhapāso ca, mandiraṅgā tulā api;
anya-e0809n0:757_0: Thiyaṃ sammujjanī ceva, sammajjanī ca sodhanī.
anya-e0809n0:760_0: Atho kacavaro, klāpo, saṅkāro ca kasambupi.
anya-e0809n0:762_0: Gharādibhūmi taṃ vatthu, gāmo saṃvasatho tha so;
anya-e0809n0:763_0: Pākaṭo nigamo bhoga, maccādibhyo dhi tūdito ‘adhibhū’ti īrito kathito (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n0:770_0: Manusso mānuso macco, mānavo manujo naro;
anya-e0809n0:774_0: Budho vidvā vibhāvī ca, santo sappañña kovidā;
anya-e0809n0:775_0: Dhīmā sudhī kavi byatto, vicakkhaṇo visārado.
anya-e0809n0:777_0: Medhāvī matimā pañño, viññū ca vidūro vidū;
anya-e0809n0:778_0: Dhīro vipassī dosaññū, buddho ca dabba viddasu.
anya-e0809n0:780_0: Itthī sīmantinī nārī, thī vadhū vanitā, ṅganā;
anya-e0809n0:781_0: Pamadā sundarī kantā, ramaṇī dayitā, balā.
anya-e0809n0:783_0: Mātugāmo ca mahilā, lalanā bhīru kāminī;
anya-e0809n0:784_0: Kumārikā tu kaññā tha, yuvatī taruṇī bhave.
anya-e0809n0:788_0: Dhavatthinī tu saṅketaṃ, yāti yā sā, bhisārikā.
anya-e0809n0:791_0: Rūpūpajīvinī vesī, kulaṭā tu ca bandhakī.
anya-e0809n0:797_0: Vijātā tu pasūtā ca, jātāpaccā pasūtikā.
anya-e0809n0:799_0: Dūtī sañcārikā dāsī, tu ceṭī kuṭadhārikā;
anya-e0809n0:800_0: Vāruṇī, kkhaṇikā tulyā, khattiyānī tu khattiyā.
anya-e0809n0:802_0: Dāro jāyā kalattañca, gharaṇī bhariyā piyā,
anya-e0809n0:805_0: Sakhī tvā’lī vayassā tha, jārī cevā’ticārinī;
anya-e0809n0:806_0: Pume tū’tu rajo pupphaṃ, utunī tu rajassalā.
anya-e0809n0:811_0: Dhavotu sāmiko bhattā, kanto pati varo piyo;
anya-e0809n0:819_1: jayampatī tu dampatī dampatīti padaṃ pulliṅga bahuvacanantaṃ ikārantaṃ,
anya-e0809n0:820_0: Atha vassavaro vutto, paṇḍako ca napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:822_0: Bandhavo bandhu sajano, sagotto ñāti ñātako;
anya-e0809n0:826_0: Amma, mbā jananī mātā, janetti janikā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:836_0: Nattā vutto paputto tha, sāmibhātā tu devaro;
anya-e0809n0:844_0: Sodariyo sagabbho ca, sodaro sahajo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:845_0: Mātāpitū te pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro.
anya-e0809n0:848_0: Bālattaṃ bālatā bālyaṃ, yobbaññaṃtu ca yobbanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:850_0: Sukkā tu palitaṃ kesā, dayo tha jaratā jarā;
anya-e0809n0:851_0: Puthuko pillako chāpo, kumāro bāla potakā.
anya-e0809n0:855_0: Taruṇo ca vayaṭṭho ca, daharo ca yuvā susu;
anya-e0809n0:858_0: Mahallako ca vuddho ca, thero jiṇṇo ca jiṇṇako;
anya-e0809n0:859_0: Aggajo pubbajo jeṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho nujo.
anya-e0809n0:863_0: Sīso’ttamaṅgāni siro, muddhā ca matthako bhave;
anya-e0809n0:864_0: Keso tu kuntalo vālo, ttamaṅgaruha muddhajā.
anya-e0809n0:873_0: Sīmanto tu mato nāri, kesamajjhamhi paddhati.
anya-e0809n0:875_0: Lomaṃ tanuruhaṃ romaṃ, pamhaṃ pakhuma makkhigaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:876_0: Massu vuttaṃ pumamukhe, bhū tvitthī bhamuko bhamu.
anya-e0809n0:879_0: Vadanaṃ tu mukhaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, vattaṃ lapana mānanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:881_0: Dvijo lapanajo danto, dasano radano rado;
anya-e0809n0:885_0: Gaṇḍo kapolo hanvitthī gaṇḍatthī (ṭī.) hanvatthī=hanu+itthī; hana+u (ṇvādi),
anya-e0809n0:888_0: Galo ca kaṇṭho gīvā ca, kandharā ca sirodharā;
anya-e0809n0:890_0: Aṅkitā tīhi lekhāhi, kambugīvā thavā matā.
anya-e0809n0:892_0: Aṃso nitthī bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu taṃ;
anya-e0809n0:893_0: Bāhumūlaṃ tu kaccho, dho, tva’ssa passa manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:895_0: Bāhu bhujādvīsu bāhā, hattho tu kara pāṇayo;
anya-e0809n0:899_0: Karasākhā, ṅgulī tā tu, pañca, ṅguṭṭho ca tajjanī;
anya-e0809n0:900_0: Majjhimā nāmikā cāpi, kaniṭṭhā’ti kamā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:905_0: Ratanaṃ kukku hattho tha, pume karapuṭo,ñjali;
anya-e0809n0:906_0: Karajo tu nakho nitthī, khaṭako muṭṭhi ca dvīsu.
anya-e0809n0:911_0: Uro ca hadayaṃ cātha, thano kuca payodharā;
anya-e0809n0:912_0: Cūcukaṃ tu thanaggasmiṃ, piṭṭhaṃ tu piṭṭhi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:914_0: Majjho’nitthī vilaggo ca, majjhimaṃ kucchi catukkaṃ udare; 944-gāthāpi passitabbā tu dvisu;
anya-e0809n0:917_0: Jaghanaṃ tu nitambo ca, soṇī ca kaṭi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:924_0: Asuci sambhavo sukkaṃ, pāyu tu purise gudaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:925_0: Vā pume gūtha karīsa, vaccāni ca malaṃ chakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:927_0: Uccāro mīḷha mukkāro, passāvo mutta muccate;
anya-e0809n0:930_0: Dvīsvadho nābhiyā vatthi, ucchaṅga’ṅkā tu’bho pume;
anya-e0809n0:931_0: Ūru satthi pume ūru, pabbaṃ tu jāṇu jaṇṇu ca.
anya-e0809n0:933_0: Gopphako pādagaṇṭhipi, pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi;
anya-e0809n0:934_0: Pādaggaṃ papado pādo, tu pado caraṇañca vā.
anya-e0809n0:937_0: Paṇḍake aṭṭhi dhātvitthī, galantaṭṭhi tu akkhako.
anya-e0809n0:939_0: Kapparo tu kapālaṃ vā, kaṇḍarā tu mahāsirā;
anya-e0809n0:940_0: Pume nhāru citthī sirā, dhamanī tha rasaggasā.
anya-e0809n0:943_0: Tiliṅgikaṃ tu vallūra, muttattaṃ atha lohitaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:945_0: Rudhiraṃ soṇitaṃ rattaṃ, lālā kheḷo elā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:946_0: Purise māyu pittañca, semho nitthī silesumo.
anya-e0809n0:948_0: Vasā vilīnasneho tha, medo ceva vapā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:949_0: Ākappo veso nepacchaṃ, maṇḍanaṃ tu pasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:960_0: Kaṅkaṇaṃ karabhūsā tha, kiṅkiṇī kiṃkaṇī kiṃ kaṇikā (ka.) khuddaghaṇṭikā;
anya-e0809n0:961_0: Aṅgulīyaka maṅgulyā, bharaṇaṃ, sākkharaṃ tu taṃ.
anya-e0809n0:971_0: Cela macchādanaṃ vatthaṃ, vāso vasana maṃsukaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:972_0: Ambarañca paṭo nitthī, dussaṃ colo ca sāṭako.
anya-e0809n0:974_0: Khomaṃ dukūlaṃ koseyyaṃ, pattuṇṇaṃ kambalo ca vā;
anya-e0809n0:975_0: Sāṇaṃ koṭamburaṃ bhaṅga, ntyādi vatthantaraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:980_0: Uttarīya matho vattha, mahatanti mataṃ navaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:981_0: Nantakaṃ kappaṭo jiṇṇa, vasanaṃ tu paṭaccaraṃ.
anya-e0809n0:983_0: Kañcuko vāravāṇaṃ vā, tha vatthāvayave dasā;
anya-e0809n0:989_0: Arahaddhajo ca kāsāya, kāsāvāni ca cīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:992_0: Phala,ttaca, kimi, romā, nyetā vatthassa yoniyo;
anya-e0809n0:993_0: Phālaṃ kappāsikaṃ tīsu, khomādī tu tacabbhavā.
anya-e0809n0:995_0: Koseyyaṃ kimijaṃ, roma, mayaṃ tu kambalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1001_0: Visesako tu tilako, tyūbho nitthī ca cittakaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1002_0: Candano nitthiyaṃ gandha, sāro malayajo pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1013_0: Yakkhadhūpo sajjulaso, takkolaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1014_0: Kosaphala matho jāti, kosaṃ jātiphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1017_0: Alattako yāvako ca, lākhā jatu napuṃsake.
anya-e0809n0:1019_0: Sirivāso tu sarala, ddavo’ ñjanaṃ tu kajjalaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1023_0: Mālā mālyaṃ pupphadāme pupphaṃ dāmaṃ (ka.), bhāvitaṃ vāsitaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n0:1026_0: Seyyā ca sayanaṃ senaṃ, pallaṅko tu ca mañcako.
anya-e0809n0:1033_0: Bibbohanaṃ co’ padhānaṃ, pīṭhikā pīṭha māsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1034_0: Kocchaṃ tu bhaddapīṭhe thā, sandī pīṭhantare matā.
anya-e0809n0:1040_0: Ghanapupphaṃ paṭalikā, setaṃ tu paṭikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1046_0: Kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ ratana, parisibbita mattharaṇaṃ kamā;
anya-e0809n0:1049_0: Dīpo padīpo pajjoto, pume tvādāsa dappaṇā;
anya-e0809n0:1050_0: Geṇḍuko kaṇḍuko tāla, vaṇṭaṃ tu bījanītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1052_0: Caṅkoṭako karaṇḍo ca, samuggo sampuṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1055_0: Vivāho payamā pāṇi, ggaho pariṇayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1058_0: Khujjo ca gaṇḍulo rassa, vāmanā tu lakuṇḍako;
anya-e0809n0:1063_0: Kuṇī hatthādivaṅko ca, valiro tu ca kekaro.
anya-e0809n0:1073_0: Ātaṅko āmayo byādhi, gado rogo rujāpi ca;
anya-e0809n0:1079_0: Ñeyyaṃ tva’ru vaṇo nitthī, phoṭo tu piḷakā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1081_0: Pubbo pūyo tha rattāti, sāro pakkhandikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1085_0: Kaṇḍū kaṇḍūti kaṇḍūyā, khajju kaṇḍūvanaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1087_0: Pāmaṃ vitacchikā kacchu, sotho tu sayathū’dito;
anya-e0809n0:1091_0: Visūcikā iti mahā, vireko tha bhagandalo bhagandaro (ka.).
anya-e0809n0:1093_0: Meho jaro kāsa sāsā, kuṭṭhaṃ sūlāmayantarā;
anya-e0809n0:1094_0: Vutto vejjo bhisakko ca, rogahārī tikicchako.
anya-e0809n0:1097_0: Bhesajja magado ceva, bhesajaṃ mo’sadhaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1105_0: Kulaṃ vaṃso ca santānā, bhijanā gotta manvayo;
anya-e0809n0:1106_0: Thiyaṃ santatya tho vaṇṇā, cattāro khattiyādayo.
anya-e0809n0:1110_0: Rājā bhūpati bhūpālo, patthivo ca narādhipo.
anya-e0809n0:1118_0: Pume licchavi vajjī ca, sakyo tu sākiyo tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:1119_0: Bhaddakaccānā bhaddā kaccānā (ṭī.) rāhula, mātā bimbā yasodharā.
anya-e0809n0:1128_0: Vaḷañje ca gahapati, mahāsālā dhane siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1131_0: Sajīvo sacivā, macco, senānī tu camūpati.
anya-e0809n0:1137_0: Kañcukī sovidallo ca, anujīvī tu sevako.
anya-e0809n0:1143_0: Amitto ripu verī ca, sapattā rāti satva’ri; (Sattu+ari)
anya-e0809n0:1147_0: Viddesī ca diso diṭṭho,thā nurodho nuvattanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1149_0: Mitto nitthī vayasso ca, sahāyo suhajjo (ṭī.) suhado sakhā;
anya-e0809n0:1153_0: Dūto tu sandesaharo, gaṇako tu muhuttiko.
anya-e0809n0:1155_0: Lekhako lipikāro ca, vaṇṇo tu akkharo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1156_0: Bhedo daṇḍo sāma dānā, nyupāyā caturo ime.
anya-e0809n0:1158_0: Upajāpotu bhedo ca, daṇḍo tu sāhasaṃ damo;
anya-e0809n0:1160_0: Sāmya’ macco sakhā koso, duggañca vijitaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1163_0: Pabhāvu’ssāha, mantānaṃ, vasā tisso hi sattiyo;
anya-e0809n0:1167_0: Manto ca mantanaṃ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
anya-e0809n0:1168_0: Tigocaro tu chakkaṇṇo, rahassaṃ guyha muccate.
anya-e0809n0:1170_0: Tīsu vivitta vijana, channā, raho raho byayaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1175_0: Āṇā ca sāsanaṃ ñeyyaṃ, uddānaṃ tu ca bandhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1177_0: Āgu vutta mantu (ka.) maparādho, karo tu bali muccate;
anya-e0809n0:1178_0: Puṇṇapatto tuṭṭhidāyo, upadā tu ca pābhataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1181_0: Suṅkaṃ tvanitthī gumbādi, deyye thā’yo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0809n0:1183_0: Ātapattaṃ tathā chattaṃ, raññaṃ tu hemamāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1184_0: Sīhāsanaṃ atho vāḷa, bījanītthī ca cāmaraṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1186_0: Khaggo ca chatta muṇhīsaṃ, pādukā vālabījanī;
anya-e0809n0:1192_0: Kuñjaro vāraṇo hatthī, mātaṅgo dvirado gajo;
anya-e0809n0:1196_0: Kāḷāvaka gaṅgeyyā, paṇḍara tambā ca piṅgalo gandho;
anya-e0809n0:1200_0: Kalabho ceva bhiṅkotha, pabhinno matta gajjitā;
anya-e0809n0:1201_0: Hatthighaṭā tu gajatā, hatthīnī tu kareṇukā.
anya-e0809n0:1212_0: Majjhamhi bandhanaṃ kacchā, kappano tu kuthādayo.
anya-e0809n0:1214_0: Opavayho rājavayho, sajjito tu ca kappito;
anya-e0809n0:1217_0: Tuttaṃ tu kaṇṇamūlamhi, matthakamhi tu aṅkuso;
anya-e0809n0:1230_0: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅko tha, javano ca javādhiko;
anya-e0809n0:1231_0: Mukhādhānaṃ khalīno vā, kasā tva ssābhitāḷinī.
anya-e0809n0:1233_0: Kusā tu nāsarajjumhi, vaḷavā’ssā khuro saphaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1234_0: Puccha manitthī naṅguṭṭhaṃ, vālahattho ca vāladhi.
anya-e0809n0:1236_0: Sandano ca ratho phussa, ratho tu naraṇāya so;
anya-e0809n0:1240_0: Sivikā yāpyayānañcā, nitthī tu sakaṭo pya’naṃ (sakaṭo pi+anaṃ);
anya-e0809n0:1241_0: Cakkaṃ rathaṅga mākhyātaṃ, tassanto nemi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1243_0: Tammajjhe piṇḍikā nābhi, kubbaro tu yugandharo;
anya-e0809n0:1246_0: Dhuro mukhe rathassaṅgā, tva kkho pakkharaādayo;
anya-e0809n0:1249_0: Rathacārī tu sūto ca, pājitā ceva sārathī;
anya-e0809n0:1253_0: Padāti pattī tu pume, padago padiko mato;
anya-e0809n0:1254_0: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṃ, kavaco vā uracchado.
anya-e0809n0:1256_0: Jālikā tha ca sannaddho, sajjo ca vammiko bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1260_0: Javano turito vegī, jetabbaṃ jeyya muccate.
anya-e0809n0:1262_0: Sūra vīrā tu vikkanto, sahāyo nucaro samā;
anya-e0809n0:1263_0: Sannaddhappabhutī tīsu, pātheyyaṃ tu ca sambalaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1265_0: Vāhinī dhajinī senā, camū cakkaṃ balaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:1277_0: Dhūlīkatesu senāya, yantiyā kkhobhanī akkhobhiṇī (ka.) tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1279_0: Sampatti sampadā lakkhī, sirī vipatti āpadā;
anya-e0809n0:1280_0: Athā vudhañca āyudhantipi pāṭho heti’tthī, satthaṃ paharaṇaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1288_0: Issāso dhanu kodaṇḍaṃ, cāpo nitthī sarāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1292_0: Vāṇo kaṇḍa musu dvīsu, khurappo urappo (ka.) tejanā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1293_0: Tūṇītthiyaṃ kalāpo ca, tūṇo tūṇīra vāṇadhi.
anya-e0809n0:1295_0: Pakkho tu vājo diddho tu, visappito saro bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1298_0: Maṇḍalaggo tu nettiṃso, asi khaggo ca sāyako;
anya-e0809n0:1301_0: Kheṭakaṃ phalakaṃ cammaṃ, illī tu karapālikā;
anya-e0809n0:1302_0: Churikā satya’siputtī, laguḷo tu ca muggaro.
anya-e0809n0:1304_0: Sallo nitthi saṅku pume, vāsī tu tacchanītthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1307_0: Kaṇayo bhindivāḷo ca, cakkaṃ kunto gadā tathā;
anya-e0809n0:1311_0: Niyyānaṃ gamanaṃ yātrā, paṭṭhānañca gamo gati;
anya-e0809n0:1312_0: Cuṇṇo paṃsu rajo ceva, dhūlī’tthī reṇu ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:1314_0: Māgadho madhuko vutto, vandī tu thutipāṭhako;
anya-e0809n0:1318_0: Ketu dhajo paṭākā ca, kadalī ketanaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1321_0: Balaṃ thāmo sahaṃ satti, vikkamo tvatisūratā;
anya-e0809n0:1322_0: Raṇe jitassa yaṃ pānaṃ, jayapānanti taṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1324_0: Saṅgāmo sampahāro cā, nitthiyaṃ samaraṃ raṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1327_0: Bhaṇḍanaṃ tu vivādo ca, viggaho kalaha medhagā;
anya-e0809n0:1331_0: Uppādo uppāto (ka.)1027-gāthā passitabbā bhūtavikati, yā subhāsubhasūcikā;
anya-e0809n0:1334_0: Nibbuddhaṃ niyuddhaṃ (ka.) mallayuddhamhi, jayo tu vijayo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1338_0: Hiṃsanaṃ saraṇaṃ hiṃsā, vadho sasana ghātanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1341_0: Nidhano nitthiyaṃ nāso, kālo’nto cavanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1351_0: Kārā tu bandhanāgāraṃ, kāraṇā tu ca yātanā.
anya-e0809n0:1354_0: Brahmabandhu dvijo vippo, brahmā bhovādī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0809n0:1358_0: Brahmacārī gahaṭṭho ca, vanappattho ca bhikkhuti;
anya-e0809n0:1362_0: Upajjhāyo upajjhā thā, cariyo nissayadādiko nissayadāyako (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n0:1364_0: Upanīyā thavā pubbaṃ, veda majjhāpaye dvijo;
anya-e0809n0:1365_0: Yo saṅgaṃ sarahassañcā, cariyo brāhmaṇesu so.
anya-e0809n0:1368_0: Yāgo tu katu yañño tha, vedītthī bhū parikkhatā.
anya-e0809n0:1370_0: Assamedho ca purisa, medho ceva niraggaḷo;
anya-e0809n0:1371_0: Sammāpāso vājapeyya, miti yāgā mahā ime.
anya-e0809n0:1375_0: Parisā sabhā samajjā ca, tathā samiti saṃsado.
anya-e0809n0:1377_0: Catasso parisā bhikkhu, bhikkhunī ca upāsakā;
anya-e0809n0:1378_0: Upāsikāyoti imā, thavā ṭṭha parisā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1384_0: Vedāna mādibhūtaṃ sā, sāvittī tipadaṃ siyā.
anya-e0809n0:1386_0: Habyapāke caru mato, sujā tu homadabbiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1387_0: Paramannaṃ tu pāyāso, habyaṃ tu havi kathyate.
anya-e0809n0:1389_0: Yūpo thūṇāyaṃ nimmantya, dārumhi tva’raṇī dvisu;
anya-e0809n0:1395_0: Pañca mahāpariccāgo, vutto seṭṭha, dhanassa ca;
anya-e0809n0:1396_0: Vasena putta dārānaṃ, rajjassa’ ṅgāna meva ca.
anya-e0809n0:1398_0: Annaṃ pānaṃ gharaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ mālā vilepanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1399_0: Gandho seyyā padīpeyyaṃ, dānavatthū siyuṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n0:1402_0: Pitudānaṃ tu nivāpo, saddhaṃ tu taṃva sātthato.
anya-e0809n0:1404_0: Pume atithi āgantu, pāhunā vesikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1405_0: Aññattha gantu micchanto, gamiko thā ggha magghiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1416_0: Upāsanaṃ tu sussūsā, sā pāricariyā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1418_0: Mona mabhāsanaṃ tuṇhī, bhāvo tha paṭipāṭi sā;
anya-e0809n0:1421_0: Tapo ca saṃyamo sīlaṃ, niyamo tu vatañca vā;
anya-e0809n0:1427_0: Yo pāpehi upāvatto, vāso saddhiṃ guṇehi so;
anya-e0809n0:1431_0: Vācaṃyamo tu muni ca, tāpaso tu isī rito.
anya-e0809n0:1440_0: Aññā tu arahattañca, thūpo tu cetiyaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1441_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko ca, ānando dve samā tha ca.
anya-e0809n0:1445_0: Bhikkhupi sāmaṇero ca, sikkhamānā ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0809n0:1448_0: Patto ticīvaraṃ kāya, bandhanaṃ vāsi sūci ca;
anya-e0809n0:1451_0: Sāmaṇero ca samaṇu, ddeso cātha digambaro;
anya-e0809n0:1452_0: Aceḷako nigaṇṭho ca, jaṭilo tu jaṭādharo.
anya-e0809n0:1457_0: Pavitto payato pūto, cammaṃ tu ajinaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1467_0: Vesso ca vesiyāno tha, jīvanaṃ vutti jīvikā;
anya-e0809n0:1473_0: Khettājīvo kassako tha, khettaṃ kedāra muccate;
anya-e0809n0:1476_0: Dāttaṃ lavitta masitaṃ “asita” saddo puṃnapuṃsake-1005-gāthā passitabbā, patodo tutta pājanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1477_0: Yottaṃ tu rajju rasmitthī, phālo tu kasako bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1480_0: Sammā tu yugakīlasmiṃ, sītā tu halapaddhati.
anya-e0809n0:1483_0: Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
anya-e0809n0:1484_0: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā.
anya-e0809n0:1489_0: Atha kaṅgu piyaṅgu’tthī, ummā tu atasī bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1490_0: Kiṭṭhañca sassaṃ dhaññañca viññeyyaṃ (ṭī.), vīhi thambakarī thambhakarī (ka.) rito.
anya-e0809n0:1492_0: Kaṇḍo tu nāḷa matha so, palālaṃ nitthi nipphalo;
anya-e0809n0:1493_0: Bhusaṃ kaliṅgaro cātha, thuso dhaññattace tha ca.
anya-e0809n0:1497_0: Khalo ca dhaññakaraṇaṃ, thambo thambho (ka.) gumbo tiṇādinaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1499_0: Ayoggo musalo nitthī, kullo suppa manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1500_0: Atho’ddhanañca culli’tthī, kilañjo tu kaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1503_0: Kolambo cātha maṇikaṃ, bhāṇako ca arañjaro.
anya-e0809n0:1505_0: Ghaṭo dvīsu kuṭo nitthī, kumbho kalasa, vārakā;
anya-e0809n0:1506_0: Kaṃso bhuñjanapatto thā, mattaṃ patto ca bhājanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1508_0: Aṇḍupakaṃ cumbaṭakaṃ, sarāvo tu ca mallako;
anya-e0809n0:1512_0: Mahosadhaṃ tu taṃ sukkhaṃ, maricaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1515_0: Dhaññambilaṃ biḷaṅgo tha, lavaṇaṃ loṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n0:1517_0: Sāmuddaṃ sindhavo nitthī, kāḷaloṇaṃ tu ubbhidaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1518_0: Biḷakaṃ biḷāla (ka.) ceti pañcete, pabhedā lavaṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n0:1520_0: Guḷo ca phāṇitaṃ khaṇḍo, macchaṇḍī sakkharā iti;
anya-e0809n0:1523_0: Lājā siyā’kkhataṃ cātha, dhānā bhaṭṭhayave bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1524_0: Abaddhasattu mantho ca, pūpā’ pūpā tu piṭṭhako.
anya-e0809n0:1527_0: Odaniko ca rasako, sūpo tu byañjanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1529_0: Odano vā kuraṃ bhattaṃ, bhikkhā cā’nna mathā sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1533_0: Khajjaṃ tu bhojja leyyāni, peyyanti catudhā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1538_0: Vighāsādo ca damako, pipāsā tu ca tassanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1541_0: Udreko ceva uggāro, sohiccaṃ titti tappanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1548_0: Uttamaṇṇo ca dhaniko, dhamaṇṇo tu iṇāyiko.
anya-e0809n0:1550_0: Uddhāro tu iṇaṃ vuttaṃ, mūlaṃ tu pābhataṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1556_0: Saṅkhyāne tu ca saṅkhyeyye, ekatte vīsatādayo;
anya-e0809n0:1559_0: Sataṃ sahassaṃ niyutaṃ nahutaṃ-nayutaṃ (katthaci), lakkhaṃ koṭi pakoṭiyo;
anya-e0809n0:1563_0: Ahahaṃ ababaṃ cevā, ṭaṭaṃ sogandhi kuppalaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1574_0: Tulā, pattha, ṅguli, vasā, tidhā māna matho siyā.
anya-e0809n0:1578_0: Dve akkhā māsakā pañca, kkhānaṃ dharaṇamaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1580_0: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ, nikkhaṃ tvanitthi pañca te;
anya-e0809n0:1581_0: Pādo bhāge catutthe tha, dharaṇāni palaṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n0:1583_0: Tulā palasataṃ cātha, bhāro vīsati tā tulā;
anya-e0809n0:1594_0: Āḷhako nitthiyaṃ tumbho, patthotu nāḷi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1600_0: Dabbaṃ vittaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, vasva’ttho vibhavo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1602_0: Koso hiraññañca katā, kataṃ kañcana, rūpiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1603_0: Kuppaṃ tadaññaṃ tambādi, rūpiyaṃ dvaya māhataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1605_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ jāta, rūpaṃ soṇṇañca kañcanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1606_0: Satthuvaṇṇo harī kambu, cāru hemañca hāṭakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1608_0: Tapaniyaṃ hiraññaṃ ta, bbhedā cāmīkarampi ca;
anya-e0809n0:1609_0: Sātakumbhaṃ tathā jambu, nadaṃ siṅgī ca nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1611_0: Rūpiyaṃ rajataṃ sajjhu, rūpī sajjhaṃ atho vasu;
anya-e0809n0:1614_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā, maṇi veḷuriyāni ca;
anya-e0809n0:1617_0: Lohitaṅko ca paduma, rāgo rattamaṇi pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1618_0: Vaṃsavaṇṇo veḷuriyaṃ, pavāḷaṃ vā ca viddumo.
anya-e0809n0:1620_0: Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi, atha muttā ca muttikaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1621_0: Rīti rīrī (ṭī.) tthī ārakūṭo vā, amalaṃ tva’bbhakaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1625_0: Kāḷatipu tu sīsañca, haritālaṃ tu pītanaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1627_0: Cinapiṭṭhañca sindūraṃ, atha tūlo tathā picu;
anya-e0809n0:1628_0: Khuddajaṃ tu madhu khuddaṃ, madhucchiṭṭhaṃ tu sitthakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1632_0: Usabho balībaddho balibadda (ka.) ca, goṇo govasabho vuso.
anya-e0809n0:1634_0: Vuddho jaraggavo so tha, dammo vacchataro samā;
anya-e0809n0:1635_0: Dhuravāhī tu dhorayho, govindo dhikato gavaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1637_0: Vaho ca khandhadeso tha, kakudho kakudo (ka.) kaku vuccate;
anya-e0809n0:1638_0: Atho visāṇaṃ siṅgañca, rattagāvī tu rohiṇī.
anya-e0809n0:1640_0: Gāvī ca siṅginī go ca, vañjhā tu kathyate vasā;
anya-e0809n0:1644_0: Gomiḷho gomayo nitthī, atho sappi ghataṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1646_0: Navuddhaṭaṃ tu nonītaṃ, damimaṇḍaṃ tu matthu ca,
anya-e0809n0:1647_0: Khīraṃ duddhaṃ payo thaññaṃ, takkaṃ tu mathitaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1649_0: Khīraṃ dadhi ghataṃ takkaṃ, nonītaṃ pañca gorasā;
anya-e0809n0:1650_0: Urabbho meṇḍa mesā ca, uraṇo avi eḷako.
anya-e0809n0:1654_0: Gadrabho tu kharo vutto, uraṇī tu ajī ajā.
anya-e0809n0:1663_0: Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
anya-e0809n0:1667_0: Rathakāro tha suvaṇṇa, kāro nāḷindhamo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1677_0: Veno vilīvakāro ca, naḷakāro samā tayo;
anya-e0809n0:1688_0: Māyā tu sambarī māyā, kāro tu indajāliko;
anya-e0809n0:1690_0: Orabbhikā sūkarikā, māgavikā te ca sākuṇikā;
anya-e0809n0:1691_0: Hantvā jīvante’ḷaka, sūkara, miga, pakkhino kamato.
anya-e0809n0:1695_0: Vetaniko tu bhatako, kammakaro tha kiṃ karo;
anya-e0809n0:1696_0: Dāso ca ceṭako pesso, bhacco ca paricāriko.
anya-e0809n0:1699_0: Dāsā karamarānīto, ccevaṃ te catudhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1706_0: Sapāko ceva caṇḍālo, mātaṅgo sapaco bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1711_0: Sārameyyo ca sunakho, suno soṇo ca kukkuro.
anya-e0809n0:1717_0: Sābandhanaṃ tu gaddūlo, dīpako tu ca cetako;
anya-e0809n0:1718_0: Bandhanaṃ gaṇṭhi pāso tha, vāgurā vākarā migabandhanī.
anya-e0809n0:1720_0: Thiyaṃ kuveṇī kumīnaṃ, ānayo jāla muccate;
anya-e0809n0:1728_0: Suttaṃ tantu pume tantaṃ, potthaṃ lepyādikammani;
anya-e0809n0:1732_0: Mañjūsā peḷā piṭako, tvitthiyaṃ pacchi peṭako.
anya-e0809n0:1735_0: Upāhano vā pādu’tthī, tabbhedā pādukā pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1742_0: Tabbhastā gaggarī nārī, sattaṃ tu pipphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1746_0: Kharo ca kakaco nitthī, sippaṃ kammaṃ kalādikaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1753_0: Opamma mupamānaṃ cu, pamā bhati tu nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1755_0: Nibbeso vetanaṃ mūlyaṃ, jūtaṃ tvanitthi ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1758_0: Pāṭibhogotu paṭibhū, akkho tu pāsako bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1759_0: Pumevā’ ṭṭhapadaṃ aṭṭhāpadaṃ sāri, phalake tha paṇo, bbhuto.
anya-e0809n0:1761_0: Kiṇṇaṃ tu madirābīje, madhu madhvāsave mataṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1762_0: Madirā vāruṇī majjaṃ, surā bhavo tu merayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1772_0: Araññaṃ kānanaṃ dāyo, gahanaṃ vipinaṃ vanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1776_0: Tarusaṇḍo sa ārāmo, tatho pavana muccate.
anya-e0809n0:1781_0: Panti vīthyā’vali seṇī, pāḷi lekhā tu rāji ca;
anya-e0809n0:1782_0: Pādapo viṭapī rukkho, ago sālo mahīruho.
anya-e0809n0:1784_0: Dumo taru kujo sākhī, gaccho tu khuddapādapo;
anya-e0809n0:1785_0: Phalanti ye vinā pupphaṃ, te vuccanti vanappatī.
anya-e0809n0:1789_0: Tīsu vañcyā’phalā cātha, phalino phalavā phalī.
anya-e0809n0:1791_0: Samphullito tu vikaco, phullo vikasito tisu;
anya-e0809n0:1792_0: Siro’ggaṃ sikharo nitthī, sākhā tu kathitā latā.
anya-e0809n0:1794_0: Dalaṃ palāsaṃ chadanaṃ, paṇṇaṃ pattaṃ chado pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1795_0: Pallavo vā kisalayaṃ, navubbhinne tu aṅkuro.
anya-e0809n0:1797_0: Makulaṃ vā kuṭumalo, khārako tu ca jālakaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1800_0: Pasavo kusumaṃ pupphaṃ, parāgo pupphajo rajo;
anya-e0809n0:1801_0: Makarando madhu mataṃ, thavako tu ca gocchako.
anya-e0809n0:1807_0: Mallikādī tu kusume, saliṅgā vīhayo phale;
anya-e0809n0:1810_0: Mūla mārabbha sākhanto, khandho bhāgo tarussa tha;
anya-e0809n0:1811_0: Koṭaro nitthiyaṃ rukkha, cchidde kaṭṭhaṃ tu dāru ca.
anya-e0809n0:1813_0: Bundo mūlañca pādo tha, saṅku’tto khāṇunitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1814_0: Karahāṭaṃ tu kando tha, kaḷīro matthako bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1816_0: Vallarī mañjarī nārī, vallī tu kathitā latā;
anya-e0809n0:1817_0: Thambho gumbo ca akkhandhe, latā virū patāninī.
anya-e0809n0:1819_0: Assattho bodhi ca dvīsu, nigrodho tu vaṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1820_0: Kabiṭṭho ca kapittho ca, yaññaṅgo tu udumbaro.
anya-e0809n0:1825_0: Dantasaṭho ca jambhīro, varaṇo tu kareri ca;
anya-e0809n0:1826_0: Kiṃ suko pālibhaddotha, vañjulo tu ca vetaso.
anya-e0809n0:1829_0: Atho guḷaphalo pīlu, sobhañjano ca siggu ca.
anya-e0809n0:1835_0: Mālūra beluvābillo, punnāgo tu ca kesaro;
anya-e0809n0:1836_0: Sālavo tu ca loddo tha, piyālo sannakaddu ca.
anya-e0809n0:1843_0: Puṇḍarīko ca setambo, selu tu bahuvārako;
anya-e0809n0:1844_0: Sepaṇṇī kāsmirī cātha, kolī ca badarītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1852_0: Kadambo piyako nīpo, bhallī bhallātako tisu;
anya-e0809n0:1853_0: Jhāvuko piculo cātha, tilako khurako bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1855_0: Ciñcā ca tintiṇī cātha, gaddabhaṇḍo kapītano;
anya-e0809n0:1859_0: Niculo mucalindo ca, nīpo tha piyako tathā;
anya-e0809n0:1864_0: Yūpo pūgo (ka.) tu kamuko cātha, paṭṭi lākhāpasādano.
anya-e0809n0:1869_0: Pakiriyo pūtiko tha, rohī rohitako bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1870_0: Eraṇḍo tu ca āmaṇḍo, atha sattuphalā samī.
anya-e0809n0:1873_0: Somavakko tu kadaro, sallotu madano bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1875_0: Athāpi indasālo ca, sallakī khārako siyā;
anya-e0809n0:1876_0: Devadāru bhaddadāru, campeyyo tu ca campako.
anya-e0809n0:1882_0: Nimbo’riṭṭho pucimando, karako tu ca dāḷimo.
anya-e0809n0:1884_0: Saralo pūtikaṭṭhañca, kapilā tu ca siṃsapā;
anya-e0809n0:1885_0: Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgupi, sirīso tu ca bhaṇḍilo.
anya-e0809n0:1892_0: Tāpiñcho ca tamālo tha, kuṭajo girimallikā.
anya-e0809n0:1894_0: Indayavo phale tassā, ggimantho kaṇikā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1895_0: Niguṇṭhi’tthī sinduvāro, tiṇasuññaṃ tiṇasūlaṃ (ṭī.) tu mallikā.
anya-e0809n0:1904_0: Mātuluṅgo bījapūro, ummatto tu ca mātulo.
anya-e0809n0:1906_0: Karamando suseno ca, kundaṃ tu māghya muccate;
anya-e0809n0:1914_0: Japā tu jayasumanaṃ, karīro kakaco bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1919_0: Pūtilatā gaḷocī ca, mubbā madhurasā pyatha.
anya-e0809n0:1921_0: Kapikacchu duphasso tha, mañjiṭṭhā vikasā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1922_0: Ambaṭṭhā ca tathā pāṭhā, kaṭukā kaṭurohiṇī.
anya-e0809n0:1930_0: Nididdhikā tu byagghī ca, atha nīlī ca nīlinī;
anya-e0809n0:1931_0: Jiñjuko jiñjukā (ka.) ceva guñjā tha, satamūlī satāvarī.
anya-e0809n0:1936_0: Nuhī ceva mahānāmo, muddikā tu madhurasā;
anya-e0809n0:1939_0: Vātiṅgaṇo ca bhaṇḍākī, vāttākī brahatī pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:1940_0: Nāgabalā ceva jhasā, lāṅgalī tu ca sāradī.
anya-e0809n0:1942_0: Rambhā ca kadalī moco, kappāsī badarā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1943_0: Nāgalatā tu tambūlī, aggijālā tu dhātakī.
anya-e0809n0:1945_0: Tivutā tipuṭā cātha, sāmā kāḷā ca kathyate;
anya-e0809n0:1946_0: Atho siṅgī ca usabho, reṇukā kapiḷā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1949_0: Seleyya’ masmapupphañca, elā tu bahulā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:1951_0: Kuṭṭhañca byādhi kathito, vāneyyaṃ tu kuṭannaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1954_0: Mūlaṃ pattaṃ kaḷīra’ggaṃ, kandaṃ miñjā phalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:1955_0: Taco pupphañca chattanti, sākaṃ dasavidhaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:1959_0: Jīvanti jīvanī cātha, madhurako ca jīvako.
anya-e0809n0:1961_0: Mahākando ca lasuṇaṃ, palaṇḍu tu sukandako;
anya-e0809n0:1962_0: Paṭolo tittako cātha, bhiṅgarājo ca makkavo.
anya-e0809n0:1965_0: Kāravello tu susavī, tumbyā’lābu ca lābu sā.
anya-e0809n0:1967_0: Eḷālukañca kakkārī, kumbhaṇḍo tu ca vallibho;
anya-e0809n0:1970_0: Mūlako nitthiyaṃ cuccu, tambako ca kalambako;
anya-e0809n0:1973_0: Saddalo ceva dubbā ca, golomī sā sitā bhave;
anya-e0809n0:1974_0: Gundā ca bhaddamuttañca, rasālo tu’cchu veḷu tu.
anya-e0809n0:1976_0: Tacasāro veṇu vaṃso, pabbaṃ tu phalu gaṇṭhiso;
anya-e0809n0:1977_0: Kīcakā te siyuṃ veṇū, ye nadantyā’niladdhutā.
anya-e0809n0:1979_0: Naḷo ca dhamano poṭa, galo tu kāsa mitthi na;
anya-e0809n0:1980_0: Tejano tu saro, mūlaṃ, tū’ sīraṃ bīraṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n0:1982_0: Kuso varahisaṃ dabbo, bhūtiṇakaṃ tu bhūtiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:1986_0: Tālo vibhedikā cātha, khajjurī sindi vuccati;
anya-e0809n0:1988_0: Hintāla, tāla, khajjūrī, nālikerā tatheva ca;
anya-e0809n0:1989_0: Tālī ca ketakī nārī, pūgo ca tiṇapādapāti.
anya-e0809n0:1997_0: Viñjho paṇḍava vaṅkādī, pubbaselo tu co’dayo;
anya-e0809n0:2001_0: Kālakūṭo tikūṭā’ssa, pattho tu sānu nitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2003_0: Kūṭo vā sikharaṃ siṅgaṃ, papāto tu taṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2006_0: Darī’tthī kandaro dvīsu, leṇaṃ tu gabbharaṃ guhā;
anya-e0809n0:2007_0: Silāpokkharaṇī soṇḍī, kuñjaṃ nikuñja mitthi na.
anya-e0809n0:2009_0: Uddha madhiccakā sela, ssāsannā bhūmyu paccakā;
anya-e0809n0:2014_0: Migindo kesarī sīho, taraccho tu migādano;
anya-e0809n0:2015_0: Byaggho tu puṇḍarīko tha, saddūlo dīpinī’rito.
anya-e0809n0:2022_0: Khagga khaggavisāṇā tu, palāsādo ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n0:2025_0: Makkaṭo vānaro sākhā, migo kapi valīmukho;
anya-e0809n0:2029_0: Siṅgālo sigālo (sī.) jambuko kotthu, bheravo ca sivā pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2030_0: Biḷāro babbu mañjāro, koko tu ca vako bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2037_0: Hariṇo miga sāraṅgā, mago ajinayoni ca;
anya-e0809n0:2041_0: Eṇeyyo eṇīmigo ca, pampaṭako tu pampako;
anya-e0809n0:2042_0: Vātamigo tu calanī, mūsiko tvā’khu unduro.
anya-e0809n0:2045_0: Ruru raṅku ca nīko ca, sarabhādī migantarā.
anya-e0809n0:2048_0: Migā tu pasavo sīhā, dayo sabbacatuppadā.
anya-e0809n0:2050_0: Lūtā tu lūtikā uṇṇa, nābhi makkaṭako siyā;
anya-e0809n0:2053_0: Godhā kuṇḍo pyatho kaṇṇa, jalūkā satapadyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2054_0: Kalandako kāḷakā tha, nakulo maṅguso bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2056_0: Kakaṇṭako ca saraṭo, kīṭo tu puḷavo kimi;
anya-e0809n0:2061_0: Sakuṇo ca sakunto vi, pataṅgo sakuṇī dvijo.
anya-e0809n0:2063_0: Vakkaṅgo pattayāno ca, patanto nīḷajo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2064_0: Tabbhedā vaṭṭakā jīva, ñjīvo cakora tittirā.
anya-e0809n0:2069_0: Patattaṃ pekhuṇaṃ pattaṃ, pakkho piñchaṃ chado garu;
anya-e0809n0:2070_0: Aṇḍaṃ tu pakkhibīje tha, nīḷo nitthī kulāvakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2073_0: Yugaṃ tu yugalaṃ dvandaṃ, yamakaṃ yamalaṃ yamaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2075_0: Samūho gaṇa saṅghātā, samudāyo ca sañcayo;
anya-e0809n0:2076_0: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo.
anya-e0809n0:2078_0: Kāyo khandho samudayo, ghaṭā samiti saṃhati;
anya-e0809n0:2079_0: Rāsi puñjo samavāyo, pūgo jātaṃ kadambakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2081_0: Byūho vitāna gumbā ca, kalāpo jāla maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2085_0: Sajātikānaṃ tu kulaṃ, nikāyo tu sadhamminaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2092_0: Kalāpī ca sikhī kekī, cūḷā tu ca sikhā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2095_0: Candako mecako cātha, chappado ca madhubbato.
anya-e0809n0:2098_0: Pārāvato kapoto ca, kakuṭo ca pārevato.
anya-e0809n0:2100_0: Gijjho gaddhotha kulalo, seno byagghīnaso pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2103_0: Uhuṅkāro ulūko ca, kosiyo vāyasāri ca;
anya-e0809n0:2104_0: Kāko tva’riṭṭho dhaṅko ca, balipuṭṭho ca vāyaso.
anya-e0809n0:2111_0: Suvo tu kīro ca suko, tambacūḷo tu kukkuṭo.
anya-e0809n0:2113_0: Vanakukkuṭo ca nijjivho, atha koñcā ca kuntanī;
anya-e0809n0:2114_0: Cakkavāko tu cakkavho, sāraṅgotu ca cātako.
anya-e0809n0:2121_0: Lohapiṭṭho tathā kaṅko, khañjarīṭo tu khañjano;
anya-e0809n0:2122_0: Kalaviṅko tu cāṭako, dindibho tu kikī bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2131_0: Sūcimukho ca makaso, cīrī tu jhallikā jhillikā (ka.) tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:2132_0: Jatukā jinapattā tha, haṃso setacchado bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2141_0: Randhaṃ tu vivaraṃ chiddaṃ, kuharaṃ susiraṃ bilaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2143_0: Susi’tthī chiggalaṃ sobbhaṃ, sacchidde susiraṃ tisu;
anya-e0809n0:2144_0: Thiyaṃ tu kāsu āvāṭo, sapparājā tu vāsukī.
anya-e0809n0:2151_0: Silutto gharasappo tha, nīlasappo silābhu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2154_0: Sarīsapo phaṇī sappā, lagaddā bhogi pannagā.
anya-e0809n0:2156_0: Dvijivho urago vāḷo, dīgho ca dīghapiṭṭhiko;
anya-e0809n0:2157_0: Pādūdaro visadharo, bhogo tu phaṇino tanu.
anya-e0809n0:2159_0: Āsī’tthī sappadāṭhā tha, nimmoko kañcuko samā;
anya-e0809n0:2160_0: Visaṃ tva’nitthī garaḷaṃ, tabbhedā vā halāhalo.
anya-e0809n0:2164_0: Nirayo duggati’tthī ca, narako, so mahā’ṭṭhadhā;
anya-e0809n0:2168_0: Thiyaṃ vetaraṇī loha, kumbhī tattha jalāsayā;
anya-e0809n0:2177_0: Thevo tu bindu phusitaṃ, bhamo tu jalaniggamo.
anya-e0809n0:2179_0: Āpo payo jalaṃ vāri, pānīyaṃ salilaṃ dakaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2180_0: Aṇṇo nīraṃ vanaṃ vālaṃ, toyaṃ ambu’dakañca kaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2182_0: Taraṅgo ca tathā bhaṅgo, ūmi vīci pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2183_0: Ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcīsu kathyate.
anya-e0809n0:2185_0: Jambālo kalalaṃ paṅko, cikkhallaṃ kaddamo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2186_0: Pulinaṃ vālukā vaṇṇu, marū’ru sikatā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2189_0: Tīraṃ tu kūlaṃ rodhañca, patīrañca taṭaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n0:2191_0: Pāraṃ paramhi tīramhi, oraṃ tva’pāra muccate;
anya-e0809n0:2192_0: Uḷumpo uḷupo (ka.) tu plavo kullo, taro ca paccarī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2194_0: Taraṇī tari nāvā ca, kūpako tu ca kumbhakaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2202_0: Poto pavahanaṃ vuttaṃ, doṇi tvi’tthī tathā’mbaṇaṃ ammaṇaṃ (sī.).
anya-e0809n0:2204_0: Gabhīra ninna gambhīrā, tho ttānaṃ tabbipakkhake;
anya-e0809n0:2208_0: Dhīvaro macchiko maccha, bandha kevaṭṭa jālikā.
anya-e0809n0:2211_0: Rohito magguro siṅgī, balajo muñja pāvusā.
anya-e0809n0:2213_0: Sattavaṅko savaṅko ca, naḷamīno ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n0:2219_0: Pāsāṇamaccho pāṭhīno, vaṅko tu baḷiso bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2223_0: Kakkaṭako kuḷīro ca, jalūkā tu ca rattapā;
anya-e0809n0:2227_0: Atha sippī ca sutti’tthī, saṅkhe tu kambu’nitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2230_0: Jalāsayo jalādhāro, gambhīro rahado tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:2233_0: Taḷāko ca saro’nitthī, vāpī ca sarasī’tthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2236_0: Anotatto tathā kaṇṇa, muṇḍo ca rathakārako;
anya-e0809n0:2237_0: Chaddanto ca kuṇālo ca, vuttā mandākinī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2240_0: Āhāvo tu nipānañcā, khātaṃ tu devakhātakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2242_0: Savantī ninnagā sindhu, saritā āpagā nadī;
anya-e0809n0:2243_0: Bhāgīrathī tu gaṅgā tha, sambhedo sindhusaṅgamo.
anya-e0809n0:2245_0: Gaṅgā’ciravatī ceva, yamunā sarabhū (sarabū sarayū (ka.) ) mahī;
anya-e0809n0:2246_0: Imā mahānadī pañca, candabhāgā sarassatī sarasvatī.
anya-e0809n0:2248_0: Nerañjarā ca kāverī, nammadādī ca ninnagā;
anya-e0809n0:2249_0: Vārimaggo paṇālī’tthī panāḷī (ṭī.), pume candanikā tu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2254_0: Anitthī padumaṃ paṅke, ruhaṃ nalina pokkharaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2258_0: Kiñjakkho kesaro nitthī, daṇḍo tu nāla muccate.
anya-e0809n0:2260_0: Bhisaṃ muḷālo nitthī ca, bījakoso tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n0:2275_0: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
anya-e0809n0:2280_0: Sobhanaṃ ruciraṃ sādhu, manuññaṃ cāru sundaraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2281_0: Vaggu manoramaṃ kantaṃ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2283_0: Bhaddaṃ vāmañca kalyāṇaṃ, manāpaṃ laddhakaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2286_0: Mukhyo padhānaṃ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2287_0: Paṇītaṃ paramaṃ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
anya-e0809n0:2290_0: Sīha kuñjara saddūlā, dī tu samāsagā pume.
anya-e0809n0:2293_0: Iṭṭhaṃ tu subhagaṃ hajjaṃ, dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ piyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2295_0: Tucchañca rittakaṃ suññaṃ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2296_0: Mejjhaṃ pūtaṃ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
anya-e0809n0:2298_0: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
anya-e0809n0:2303_0: Brahā mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, visālaṃ puthulaṃ puthu.
anya-e0809n0:2305_0: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṃ thūlañca pīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2306_0: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṃ nicitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2308_0: Sabbaṃ samatta makhilaṃ, nikhilaṃ sakalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:2311_0: Bhūri pahutaṃ pacuraṃ, bhiyyo sambahulaṃ bahu;
anya-e0809n0:2314_0: Parosatādī te, yesaṃ, paraṃ mattaṃ satādito;
anya-e0809n0:2315_0: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ khuddaṃ, thoka mappaṃ kisaṃ tanu.
anya-e0809n0:2322_0: Sakāsaṃ antikaṃ ñattaṃ, dūraṃ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2324_0: Nirantaraṃ ghanaṃ sandaṃ, viraḷaṃ pelavaṃ tanu;
anya-e0809n0:2325_0: Athā yataṃ dīgha matho, nittalaṃ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2327_0: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
anya-e0809n0:2328_0: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
anya-e0809n0:2330_0: Aḷāraṃ vellitaṃ vaṅkaṃ, kuṭilaṃ jimha kuñcitaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2331_0: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
anya-e0809n0:2334_0: Lahu sallahukaṃ cātha, saṅkhyātaṃ gaṇitaṃ mitaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2336_0: Tiṇhaṃ tu tikhiṇaṃ tibbaṃ, caṇḍaṃ uggaṃ kharaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2340_0: Thāvaro jaṅgamā añño, lolaṃ tu cañcalaṃ calaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2345_0: Kurūraṃ kaṭhinaṃ daḷhaṃ, niṭṭhuraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2348_0: Jighaññaṃ carimaṃ pubbaṃ, tva’ggaṃ paṭhama mādi so;
anya-e0809n0:2351_0: Byattaṃ puṭa phuṭaṃ (sī.) ñca mudu tu, sukumārañca komalaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2354_0: Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2355_0: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṃ tu niraggalaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2357_0: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
anya-e0809n0:2358_0: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṃ, sambādho tu ca saṃkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2360_0: Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ sabyaṃ; Apasabyaṃ tu dakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2366_0: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
anya-e0809n0:2367_0: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
anya-e0809n0:2370_0: Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2372_0: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2377_0: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2383_0: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
anya-e0809n0:2387_0: Kāruṇiko dayālupi, sūrato ussuko tu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2390_0: Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
anya-e0809n0:2391_0: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
anya-e0809n0:2397_0: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
anya-e0809n0:2407_0: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
anya-e0809n0:2409_0: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu ca lajjālutu ca lajjavā (ka.);
anya-e0809n0:2410_0: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2412_0: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
anya-e0809n0:2413_0: Eḷamūgo tu vattuñca, sotuṃ cā’kusalo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2416_0: Vācālo bahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
anya-e0809n0:2423_0: Sīsacchejjamhi vajjho tha, nikato ca saṭho’nuju;
anya-e0809n0:2427_0: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṃ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
anya-e0809n0:2430_0: Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2431_0: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
anya-e0809n0:2434_0: Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
anya-e0809n0:2442_0: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṃ kuthitaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2445_0: Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
anya-e0809n0:2446_0: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṃ tu ca tejitaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2448_0: Pattabbaṃ gamma māpajjaṃ āsajjaṃ (ka.), pakkaṃ pariṇataṃ samā;
anya-e0809n0:2449_0: Veṭhitaṃ tu valayitaṃ, ruddhaṃ saṃvuta māvutaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2455_0: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṃ dhanitaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2459_0: Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
anya-e0809n0:2460_0: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
anya-e0809n0:2472_0: Bhaṭṭhaṃ tu galitaṃ pannaṃ, cutañca dhaṃsitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2480_0: Anvesitaṃ gavesitaṃ, laddhaṃ tu patta muccate.
anya-e0809n0:2483_0: Pālitaṃ atha ossaṭṭhaṃ, cattaṃ hīnaṃ samujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2498_0: Ñeyyaṃ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
anya-e0809n0:2501_0: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṃ tu suddhakammani;
anya-e0809n0:2504_0: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṃ, tappanaṃ tu ca pīṇanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2508_0: Ninnimittaṃ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
anya-e0809n0:2521_0: Jīraṇaṃ jāni tāṇaṃ tu, rakkhaṇaṃ pamitippamā;
anya-e0809n0:2525_0: Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2539_0: Majjhanhiko majjhantiko tu majjhanho, vemattaṃ tu ca nānatā.
anya-e0809n0:2541_0: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṃ jāgariyo (ṭī.), pavāho tu pavatti ca;
anya-e0809n0:2553_0: Osānaṃ pariyosānaṃ, ukkaṃso’tisayo bhave avasānaṃ samāpanaṃ (?);
anya-e0809n0:2557_0: Kiccaṃ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2562_0: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
anya-e0809n0:2576_0: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0809n0:2577_0: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n0:2580_0: Pamāṇe ca pasaṃsāyaṃ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
anya-e0809n0:2586_0: Cakkaṃ sampattiyaṃ cakka, ratane maṇḍale bale.
anya-e0809n0:2599_0: Attho payojane saddā, bhidheyye vuddhiyaṃ dhane;
anya-e0809n0:2605_0: Guṇo paṭala rāsīsu, ānisaṃse ca bandhane;
anya-e0809n0:2606_0: Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:2609_0: Bhūto satta mahābhūtā, manussesu na nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2611_0: Vāccaliṅgo atītasmiṃ, jāte patte same mato;
anya-e0809n0:2616_0: Anto nitthī samīpe cā, vasāne padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n0:2619_0: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
anya-e0809n0:2623_0: Vāsaṭṭhāne ca gamane, visaṭatte visaratta visadatte gatīritā.
anya-e0809n0:2625_0: Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2631_0: Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
anya-e0809n0:2632_0: Kathane pamuttabhāva, jjhenādo jjhesanādo (sī.) vutta mapi tīsu.
anya-e0809n0:2637_0: Sotaviññeyya satthesu, sutaṃ putte suto siyā;
anya-e0809n0:2639_0: Kappo kāle yuge lese, paññatti paramāyusu;
anya-e0809n0:2650_0: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
anya-e0809n0:2652_0: Ārogye kusalaṃ iṭṭha, vipāke kusalo tathā;
anya-e0809n0:2661_0: Sevito yena yo niccaṃ, tatthāpi visayo siyā;
anya-e0809n0:2662_0: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
anya-e0809n0:2664_0: Bhāvo padatthe sattāya, madhippāya kriyāsu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2667_0: So bandhave’ttani ca saṃ, so dhanasmi manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2668_0: Sā pume sunakhe vutto, ttaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n0:2670_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanake vuttaṃ, suvaṇṇo garuḷe tathā;
anya-e0809n0:2673_0: Varo devādikā devādito (sī.) iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
anya-e0809n0:2674_0: Uttame vāccaliṅgo so, varaṃ mandappiye byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2679_0: Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n0:2680_0: Brahmā vutto tathā brahmaṃ, vede tapasi vuccate.
anya-e0809n0:2683_0: Mekhalāyaṃ matā kacchā, kaccho vutto latāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:2687_0: Pamāṇaṃ hetu satthesu, māne ca saccavādini;
anya-e0809n0:2690_0: Sattaṃ dabba’ttabhāvesu, pāṇesu ca bale, siyā bale sakkā (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n0:2699_0: Padaṃ ṭhāne parittāṇe, nibbānamhi ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0809n0:2700_0: Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2705_0: Khuddā ca makkhikābhede, madhumhi khudda, mappake;
anya-e0809n0:2706_0: Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
anya-e0809n0:2708_0: Takke maraṇaliṅge ca, ariṭṭhaṃ asubhe subhe,;
anya-e0809n0:2709_0: Ariṭṭho āsave kāke, nimbe ca pheniladdume.
anya-e0809n0:2714_0: Mittakāre lañjadāne, bale rāsi vipattisu balarāsi vipattisu (ka.);
anya-e0809n0:2717_0: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṃ vaṇṇe ca paccaye;
anya-e0809n0:2718_0: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2720_0: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṃ madane rate;
anya-e0809n0:2721_0: Kāmo, kāmaṃ nikāme, cā, nuññāyaṃ kāma mabyayaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2729_0: Vuddhiyaṃ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2741_0: Ārammaṇe ca saṃsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
anya-e0809n0:2744_0: Tīsu channaṃ patirūpe, chādite ca nigūhite;
anya-e0809n0:2756_0: Viññāṇe cittakamme ca, vicitte citta muccate;
anya-e0809n0:2759_0: Sāmaṃ vedantare sāntve, taṃ pīte sāmale tisu;
anya-e0809n0:2760_0: Sayamatthe byayaṃ sāmaṃ, sāmā ca sārivāyapi.
anya-e0809n0:2763_0: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarā’lahukesu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2765_0: Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
anya-e0809n0:2769_0: Devo visuddhidevā’do, megha maccu nabhesu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2770_0: Athopi taruṇe satte, corepi māṇavo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2775_0: Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2776_0: Uḷāro tīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
anya-e0809n0:2778_0: Sampanno tīsu sampuṇṇe, madhure ca samaṅgini;
anya-e0809n0:2779_0: Saṅkhā tu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2782_0: Atho māne pakāreca, koṭṭhāseca vidho dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:2785_0: Ñāṇe ca somanasseca, vedo chandasi co’ccate.
anya-e0809n0:2787_0: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sā yoni so (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n0:2788_0: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṃ, velā rāsimhi bhāsitā.
anya-e0809n0:2790_0: Vohāro sadda paṇṇatti, vaṇijjā cetanāsu ca;
anya-e0809n0:2795_0: Rāge tu mānaso cittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2797_0: Mūlaṃ bhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
anya-e0809n0:2798_0: Rūpādyaṃ’sa pakaṇḍesu, khandho rāsi guṇesu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2801_0: Atho hadayavatthumhi, citte ca hadayaṃ ure.
anya-e0809n0:2807_0: Ālambaro tu sārambhe, bheribhede ca dissati.
anya-e0809n0:2813_0: Vissāse yācanāyañca, peme ca paṇayo mato.
anya-e0809n0:2818_0: Samatthane mato citte, kaggatāyaṃ samādhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:2823_0: Bhūmibhāge kilese ca, male cā’ṅgaṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n0:2825_0: Dhanādidappe paññāya, abhimāno mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:2826_0: Apadeso nimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
anya-e0809n0:2828_0: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attā parama’ttani;
anya-e0809n0:2829_0: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṃ thambhasmiṃ (ṭī.), samūhe balasajjane.
anya-e0809n0:2831_0: Antoghare kusūle ca, koṭṭho ntokucchiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2835_0: Atho sikhaṇḍe tūṇīre, kalāpo nikare mato.
anya-e0809n0:2837_0: Cūḷā saṃyatakesesu, makuṭe moḷi ca dvisu;
anya-e0809n0:2838_0: Saṅkho tva’nitthiyaṃ kambu, nalāṭa’ṭṭhīsu lalāṭaṭṭhīsu (sī.) gopphake.
anya-e0809n0:2840_0: Pakkho kāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
anya-e0809n0:2841_0: Dese’ṇṇave pume sindhu, saritāyaṃ sa nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2843_0: Gaje kareṇu purise, so hatthiniya mitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2846_0: Visāṇaṃ tīsu mātaṅga, dante ca pasusiṅgake;
anya-e0809n0:2847_0: Koṭiyaṃ tu mato koṇo, tathā vādittavādane.
anya-e0809n0:2849_0: Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamo tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:2853_0: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
anya-e0809n0:2856_0: Uttaṃso tva’ vataṃso ca, kaṇṇapūre ca sekhare.
anya-e0809n0:2861_0: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
anya-e0809n0:2868_0: Aṃse sippe kalā kāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
anya-e0809n0:2876_0: Kriyacitte ca karaṇe, kiriyaṃ kammani kriyā;
anya-e0809n0:2877_0: Sunisāyaṃ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhū matā.
anya-e0809n0:2880_0: Suttaṃ pāvacane riṭṭhe siddhe (ṭī.), tante taṃ supite tisu.
anya-e0809n0:2882_0: Rājaliṅgo’sabhaṅgesu, rukkhe ca kakudo kakudho pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2885_0: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṃ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:2886_0: Bhariyāyaṃ tu kedāre, sarīre khetta mīritaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2889_0: Sūlaṃ tu nitthiyaṃ heti, bhede saṃku rujāsu ca.
anya-e0809n0:2892_0: Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo, kappamhi yugale yugaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:2894_0: Itthipupphe ca reṇumhi, rajo pakatije guṇe;
anya-e0809n0:2898_0: Paṇḍake joti nakkhatta, raṃsīsva’ggimhi joti so.
anya-e0809n0:2900_0: Kaṇḍo nitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2907_0: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅga muccate.
anya-e0809n0:2910_0: Heme pañcasuvaṇṇe ca, nikkho nitthī pasādhane.
anya-e0809n0:2912_0: Tithibhede ca sākhādi, phaḷumhi pabba muccate;
anya-e0809n0:2925_0: Sassate ca dhuvo tīsu, dhuvaṃ takke ca nicchite.
anya-e0809n0:2927_0: Hare sivo, sivaṃ bhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
anya-e0809n0:2928_0: Senāyaṃ sattiyañceva, thūlatte ca balaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:2931_0: Devabhede vasu pume, paṇḍakaṃ ratane dhane.
anya-e0809n0:2933_0: Nibbānaṃ atthagamane, apavagge siyā tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:2937_0: Sukkaṃ tu sambhave, sukko, dhavale, kusale tisu.
anya-e0809n0:2939_0: Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṃ vane dhane (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n0:2942_0: Paribhāsana makkose, niyame bhāsane tha ca,
anya-e0809n0:2949_0: Tāto tāḷo (sī.) tu kuñcikāyañca, tūriyaṅge dumantare.
anya-e0809n0:2951_0: Pupphe phale ca pasavo, uppāde gabbhamocane;
anya-e0809n0:2961_0: Majjhimo dehamajjhasmiṃ, majjhabhave ca so tisu.
anya-e0809n0:2964_0: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:2966_0: Kumāro yuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:2969_0: Paṇo vetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
anya-e0809n0:2972_0: Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ dvaye pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2978_0: Cāge sabhāve nimmāne, saggo jjhāye divepyatha;
anya-e0809n0:2979_0: Rohito lohite maccha, bhede ceva migantare.
anya-e0809n0:2985_0: Dabbaṃ bhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
anya-e0809n0:2987_0: Mānaṃ pamāṇe patthādo, māno vutto vidhāya ca;
anya-e0809n0:2988_0: Atho parissame vutto, vāyāmo vīriyepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:2991_0: Chidde tu chiddavante ca, susiraṃ tūriyantare.
anya-e0809n0:2994_0: Atho gārava bhītīsu, saṃvege sambhamo mato.
anya-e0809n0:2999_0: Māse jeṭṭho, tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
anya-e0809n0:3000_0: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo, so pasatthatare tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3002_0: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
anya-e0809n0:3006_0: Bimbaṃ tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale.
anya-e0809n0:3011_0: Samā vasse, samo kheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3015_0: Rattaṃ tu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3017_0: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
anya-e0809n0:3018_0: Utubhede tu sisiro, hime so sītale tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3020_0: Sakkharā guḷabhede ca, kathalepi ca dissati;
anya-e0809n0:3021_0: Anuggahe tu saṅkhepe, gahaṇe saṅgaho mato.
anya-e0809n0:3023_0: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
anya-e0809n0:3024_0: Rājā tu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3026_0: Khalañca dhaññakaraṇe, kakke nīce khalo bhave;
anya-e0809n0:3030_0: Bhayaṅkare tu kaṭhine, kurūro tīsu niddaye.
anya-e0809n0:3035_0: Adharo tīsvadho hīne, pume dantacchade pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3036_0: Sussusā sotu micchāya, sā pāricariyāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:3038_0: Hattho pāṇimhi ratane, gaṇe soṇḍāya bhantare;
anya-e0809n0:3039_0: Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpo kumbhe ca dissati.
anya-e0809n0:3042_0: Vajjabhede ca vita taṃ, taṃ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3044_0: Sāro bale thiraṃse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n0:3047_0: Mandire rogabhede ca, khayo apacayamhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3048_0: Vāḷo tu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n0:3050_0: Sālo sajjaddume rukkhe, sālāgehe ca dissati;
anya-e0809n0:3051_0: Sote tu savanaṃ vuttaṃ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3053_0: Tīsu pato pareto ca, mate ca petayonije;
anya-e0809n0:3054_0: Khyāte tu haṭṭhe viññāte, patītaṃ vāccaliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3056_0: Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayo kathito tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:3057_0: Pattaṃ pakkhe dale, patto, bhājane so gate tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3059_0: Kusale sukataṃ, suṭṭhu, kate ca sukato tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3063_0: Assādane tu rasanaṃ, jivhāyañca dhanimhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3065_0: Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihite pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3068_0: Pāpasmiṃ gagane dukkhe, byasane cā’gha muccate;
anya-e0809n0:3069_0: Samūhe paṭalaṃ netta, roge vuttaṃ chadimhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3072_0: Sattannaṃ pūraṇe seṭṭhe, tisante sattamo tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3074_0: Ojā tu yāpanāyañca, ojo ditti balesu ca;
anya-e0809n0:3075_0: Atho nisāmanaṃ vuttaṃ, dassane savanepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3077_0: Gabbho kucchiṭṭhasatte ca, kucchi ovarakesu ca;
anya-e0809n0:3083_0: Asumhi āyumhi (ṭī.), 407-gāthā passitabbā ca bale pāṇo, satte hadayagā’nile;
anya-e0809n0:3090_0: Saraṇaṃ tu vadhe gehe, rakkhitasmiñca rakkhaṇe.
anya-e0809n0:3092_0: Thiyaṃ kantā piye, kanto, manuññe, so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n0:3093_0: Gavakkhe tu samūhe ca, jālaṃ macchādibandhane.
anya-e0809n0:3096_0: Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṃ, saddhā ca paccaye.
anya-e0809n0:3098_0: Bījaṃ hetumhi aṭṭhismiṃ, aṅgajāte ca dissati;
anya-e0809n0:3103_0: Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
anya-e0809n0:3105_0: Santāno devarukkhe ca, vutto santatiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3109_0: Chāyā tu ātapābhāve, paṭibimbe pabhāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:3111_0: Gimhe ghammo nidāgho ca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3114_0: Aṅgā dese bahumha’ṅgaṃ, aṅgo dese vapumha’ṅga (ṭī.) tathā’vayavahetusu;
anya-e0809n0:3118_0: Supinaṃ supine sutta, viññāṇe ta manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3126_0: Vutto visārado tīsu, suppagabbhe ca paṇḍite;
anya-e0809n0:3129_0: Drave vaṇṇe rasabhede, kasāyo surabhimhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3136_0: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
anya-e0809n0:3138_0: Lohabhede mataṃ tambaṃ, tambo ratte tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n0:3141_0: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṃ paṭipādanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3144_0: Satthaṃ āyudha ganthesu, lohe, sattho ca sañcaye;
anya-e0809n0:3148_0: Atha kambu mato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3151_0: Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
anya-e0809n0:3163_0: Paṭibhānaṃ tu paññāyaṃ, upaṭṭhita girāya ca.
anya-e0809n0:3166_0: Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṃ gahaṇī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3168_0: Piyo bhattari, jāyāyaṃ, piyā, iṭṭhe piyo tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3169_0: Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṃyame ca yamo bhave.
anya-e0809n0:3171_0: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3172_0: Ulloce tu ca vitthāre, vitānaṃ punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0809n0:3174_0: Apavagge ca salile, sudhāyaṃ amataṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3175_0: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tama manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3177_0: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
anya-e0809n0:3178_0: Paṇḍake sukate, puññaṃ, manuññe pavane tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3180_0: Rukkho dumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3181_0: Uppattiyaṃ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
anya-e0809n0:3183_0: Nimittaṃ kāraṇe vuttaṃ, aṅgajāte ca lañchane;
anya-e0809n0:3186_0: Vede ca mantane manto, mantā paññāya muccate;
anya-e0809n0:3189_0: Aruṇo raṃsibhede cā, byattarāge ca lohite;
anya-e0809n0:3193_0: Ākāro kāraṇe vutto, saṇṭhāne iṅgitepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3195_0: Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo, tibbamhi so tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3198_0: Kallaṃ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesu yuttadakkhesu (ka.) tīsu taṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3201_0: Kapoto pakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:3204_0: Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiye sāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n0:3205_0: Akāriye tu guyhaṅge, cīre kopīna muccate.
anya-e0809n0:3211_0: Athuppāde siyā dhūma, ketu vessānarepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3216_0: Apavagge vināse ca, nirodho rodhane pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3217_0: Bhaye paṭibhayaṃ vuttaṃ, tiliṅgaṃ taṃ bhayaṃkare.
anya-e0809n0:3223_0: Upajāpe mato bhedo, visese ca vidāraṇe.
anya-e0809n0:3229_0: Guṇukkaṃse ca vibhave, sampatti ceva sampadā.
anya-e0809n0:3231_0: Bhūkhantīsu khamā, yogye, hite sakke yutte (ṭī.) 1001-gāthā passitabbā khamo tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3232_0: Addho bhāge pathe kāle, ekaṃse’ddho’byayaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n0:3235_0: Usabho’sadha go usabho usabhe (ṭī.) seṭṭhe, sū’sabhaṃ vīsayaṭṭhiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3236_0: Setusmiṃ tanti pantīsu, nāriyaṃ pāḷi kathyate.
anya-e0809n0:3238_0: Kaṭo jaye’tthinimitte, kilañje so kate tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3241_0: Vitakke mathite takko, tathā sūciphale mato;
anya-e0809n0:3245_0: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṃ mihite sitaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3247_0: Thiyaṃ pajāpati dāre, brahme māre sure pume;
anya-e0809n0:3248_0: Vāsudeve’ntake kaṇho, so pāpe asite tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3251_0: Sakko inde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3253_0: Vajjane parihāro ca, sakkāre ceva rakkhaṇe;
anya-e0809n0:3254_0: Sotāpannādike agge, ariyo tīsu, dvije pume.
anya-e0809n0:3256_0: Susuko susumāre ca, bālake ca ulūpini;
anya-e0809n0:3259_0: Asano piyake kaṇḍe, bhakkhaṇe khipane’ sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3260_0: Yuge’dhikāre vikāre (ṭī.) vīriye, padhāne cā’ntike dhuro.
anya-e0809n0:3262_0: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asito pume;
anya-e0809n0:3265_0: Ummāre esikatthambhe, indakhīlo mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n0:3268_0: Dhaññaṃ sālyādike vuttaṃ, dhañño puññavati ttisu;
anya-e0809n0:3269_0: Pāṇi hatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ mato.
anya-e0809n0:3271_0: Tīsu pītaṃ halidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
anya-e0809n0:3274_0: Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgo ca rañjane mato;
anya-e0809n0:3275_0: Padaro phalake bhaṅge, pavuddha dariyaṃ pica.
anya-e0809n0:3281_0: Kāro’ gabhede sakkāre, kārā tu bandhanālaye.
anya-e0809n0:3284_0: Pāpane ca padātismiṃ, gamane patti nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3286_0: Chiddaṃ randhañca vivaraṃ, susire dūsanepi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3287_0: Muttā tu muttike, muttaṃ, passāve, muccite tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3289_0: Nisedhe vāraṇaṃ, hatthi, liṅga hatthīsu vāraṇo;
anya-e0809n0:3290_0: Dānaṃ cāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
anya-e0809n0:3295_0: Haritasmiñca paṇṇe ca, palāso kiṃ sukaddume;
anya-e0809n0:3298_0: Pakkaṃ phalamhi, taṃ nāsu, mmukhe nāsamukhe (ka.) pariṇate tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3299_0: Piṇḍo ājīvane dehe, piṇḍane goḷake mato.
anya-e0809n0:3301_0: Vaṭṭo paribbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3304_0: Nāriyaṃ bhīru kathitā, bhīruke so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n0:3307_0: Vāmaṃ sabyamhi, taṃ cāru, viparītesu tīsva’tha;
anya-e0809n0:3308_0: Saṅkhyābhede sarabye ca, cihaṇe lakkha muccate.
anya-e0809n0:3321_0: Sambhave cā’suci pume, amejjhe tīsu dissati.
anya-e0809n0:3323_0: Accho ikke pume vutto, pasannamhi tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n0:3324_0: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko, so kuṭile tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3328_0: Sabbasmiṃ sakalo tīsu, addhamhi purise siyā.
anya-e0809n0:3333_0: Rudhire lohitaṃ vuttaṃ, rattamhi lohito tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3334_0: Uttamaṅge pume muddhā, muddho mūḷhe tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n0:3336_0: Raṭṭhamhi vijitaṃ vuttaṃ, jite ca vijito tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3337_0: Parittaṃ tu parittāṇe, paritto tīsu appake.
anya-e0809n0:3342_0: Vaṅgo lohantare vaṅgā, dese pume bahumhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3343_0: Kammārabhaṇḍabhede ca, khaṭake muṭṭhi ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n0:3348_0: Pume mahesī sugate, deviyaṃ nāriyaṃ matā;
anya-e0809n0:3352_0: Vijjā vede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3355_0: Pajjaṃ siloke, pajjo’ddhe, pajjo pādahite tisu.
anya-e0809n0:3358_0: Vidheyye assavo tīsu, pubbamhī purise siyā.
anya-e0809n0:3363_0: Assattho tīsu assāsa, ppatte, bodhiddume pume;
anya-e0809n0:3364_0: Tīsu luddo kurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
anya-e0809n0:3366_0: Vilaggo tīsu laggasmiṃ, pume majjhamhi dissati;
anya-e0809n0:3369_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ dārumhi, taṃ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3370_0: Sasantāne ca visaye, gocare’ jjhatta muccateti.
anya-e0809n0:3373_0: Bhuvane ca jane loko, moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
anya-e0809n0:3377_0: Vaṭabyāmesu nigrodho, dhaṅko tu vāyase bake;
anya-e0809n0:3380_0: Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
anya-e0809n0:3384_0: Sūraṃ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍo tu muggare dame;
anya-e0809n0:3392_0: Dāyādo bandhave putte, sire sīsaṃ tipumhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3397_0: Thambho thūṇa jaḷattesu, sūpo kummāsa byañjane;
anya-e0809n0:3398_0: Gaṇḍo phoṭe kapolamhi, aggho mūlye ca pūjane.
anya-e0809n0:3401_0: Bhāgye vidhi vidhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
anya-e0809n0:3403_0: Sāraṅgo cātake eṇe, pattī tu sarapakkhisu;
anya-e0809n0:3411_0: Amate tu sudhā lepe, abhikhyā nāma raṃsisu;
anya-e0809n0:3412_0: Satti sāmatthiye satthe, mahī najjantare bhuvi;
anya-e0809n0:3417_0: Pavatti vutti vattāsu, vetane bharaṇe bhati.
anya-e0809n0:3420_0: Soppe pamāde tandī ca, yātrā gamana vuttisu.
anya-e0809n0:3425_0: Icchāyaṃ jutiyaṃ kanti, rañjane sūrate rati;
anya-e0809n0:3426_0: Gehe vasati vāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
anya-e0809n0:3428_0: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samiti saṅgame;
anya-e0809n0:3429_0: Taṇhā lobhe pipāsāyaṃ, magga vuttīsu vattanī.
anya-e0809n0:3431_0: Pāṇyaṅge nābhi cakkante, yāce viññatti ñāpane;
anya-e0809n0:3432_0: Vitti tose vedanāyaṃ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
anya-e0809n0:3434_0: Taraṅge cā’ntare vīci, dhīratte dhāraṇe dhiti;
anya-e0809n0:3435_0: Bhū bhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
anya-e0809n0:3437_0: Gottaṃ nāme ca vaṃse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3438_0: Okaṃ tu nissaye gehe, kulaṃ tu gottarāsisu.
anya-e0809n0:3440_0: Heme vitte hiraññañca, paññāṇaṃ tva’ṅka vuddhisu;
anya-e0809n0:3441_0: Athā’mbarañca khe vatthe, guyhaṃ liṅge rahasya’pi.
anya-e0809n0:3443_0: Tapo dhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3444_0: Ratanaṃ maṇi seṭṭhesu, vassaṃ hāyana vuṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n0:3446_0: Vanaṃ arañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
anya-e0809n0:3447_0: Akkharaṃ lipi mokkhesu, methūnaṃ saṅgame rate.
anya-e0809n0:3449_0: Sotaṃ kaṇṇe payovege, riṭṭhaṃ pāpā’subhesu ca;
anya-e0809n0:3453_0: Vāccaliṅgā paramito, byatto tu paṇḍite phuṭe.
anya-e0809n0:3459_0: Bībhaccho vikate bhīme, komale tikhiṇe mudu;
anya-e0809n0:3460_0: Iṭṭhe ca madhure sādu, sādumhi madhuro piye.
anya-e0809n0:3462_0: Site tu suddhe odāto, dvijivho sūcakā’hisu;
anya-e0809n0:3468_0: Suci suddhe site pūte, pesalo dakkhacārusu;
anya-e0809n0:3469_0: Adhamo kucchite ūne, appiye pya’liko bhave.
anya-e0809n0:3471_0: Byāpe asuddhe saṃkiṇṇo, bhabbaṃ yogye ca bhāvini;
anya-e0809n0:3472_0: Sukhumo appakā’ṇūsu, vuddho there ca paṇḍite.
anya-e0809n0:3474_0: Subhe sādhumhi bhaddo tha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
anya-e0809n0:3475_0: Dhīro budhe dhitimante, vellitaṃ kuṭile dhute.
anya-e0809n0:3477_0: Visado byatta setesu, taruṇo tu yuve nave;
anya-e0809n0:3482_0: Kalyāṇaṃ sundare cāpi, himo tu sītalepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3484_0: Lole tu sīghe capalo, vutte udita muggate;
anya-e0809n0:3485_0: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṃ tu cuṇṇitepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3487_0: Vigate vāyite vāyane (ka.) vītaṃ, bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitepi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3488_0: Bhajjite patite bhaṭṭho, puṭṭho pucchita posite.
anya-e0809n0:3492_0: Sūro vīre ravisūre, duṭṭho kuddhe ca dūsite.
anya-e0809n0:3496_0: Nindāyaṃ khepane khepo, niyamo nicchaye vate.
anya-e0809n0:3507_0: Mālyaṃ tu pupphe taddāme, vāho tu sakaṭe haye.
anya-e0809n0:3510_0: Bhe tārakā nettamajjhe, sīmā’ vadhi, ṭṭhitīsu ca.
anya-e0809n0:3514_0: Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latā sākhāya valliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3518_0: Nīce puthujjano mūḷhe, bhattā sāmini dhārake.
anya-e0809n0:3520_0: Sikhā, piñchesu sikhaṇḍo, satte tva’ttani puggalo;
anya-e0809n0:3524_0: Vacco rūpe karīse tha, juti’tthī kantiraṃsisu;
anya-e0809n0:3526_0: Labbhaṃ yutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3527_0: Sallaṃ kaṇḍe salākāyaṃ, sucitte dhāvanaṃ gate;
anya-e0809n0:3532_0: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhū niccappabhūsu so.
anya-e0809n0:3534_0: Khagge kurūre nettiṃso, parasmiṃ atra tīsva’mu;
anya-e0809n0:3539_0: Yānaṃ rathādo gamane, sarūpasmiṃ adho talaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3541_0: Majjho vilagge vemajjhe, pupphaṃ tu kusumo’tusu;
anya-e0809n0:3542_0: Sīlaṃ sabhāve subbate, puṅgavo usabhe vare.
anya-e0809n0:3545_0: Nettiṃse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambo tu dume caye.
anya-e0809n0:3548_0: Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṃ pāpe ca kaddame.
anya-e0809n0:3551_0: Bale pabhāve vīriyaṃ, tejo tesu ca dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3553_0: Dhārā santati khaggaṅge, vānaṃ taṇhāya sibbane;
anya-e0809n0:3554_0: Khattā sūte paṭihāre, vitti pīḷāsu vedanā.
anya-e0809n0:3556_0: Thiyaṃ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
anya-e0809n0:3557_0: Lavotu bindu’cchedesu, palāle’ palāse (ṭī.), palāpe-ṭī (453-1124) gāthā passitabbā tisaye bhusaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3559_0: Bādhā dukkhe nisedhe ca, mūlapadepi mātikā;
anya-e0809n0:3563_0: Ketusmiṃ ketanaṃ gehe, ṭhāne bhūmi’tthiyaṃ bhuvi;
anya-e0809n0:3564_0: Lekhye lekho rāji lekhā, pūjite bhagavā jine.
anya-e0809n0:3566_0: Gadā satthe gado roge, nisajjā pīṭhesvā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3570_0: Bilaṃ koṭṭhāsa chiddesu, vajjaṃ dose ca bheriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3575_0: Yūpo thambhe ca pāsāde, ayanaṃ gamane pathe.
anya-e0809n0:3588_0: Annādo āmisaṃ maṃse; Dikkhā tu yajane’ccane.
anya-e0809n0:3592_0: Kusumaṃ thīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
anya-e0809n0:3594_0: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddo tu luddakepi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3595_0: Kalusaṃ tvā’vile pāpe, pāpe kali parājaye.
anya-e0809n0:3597_0: Kantāro vana, duggesu, caro cāramhi cañcale;
anya-e0809n0:3598_0: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṃ tu phalake tace.
anya-e0809n0:3602_0: Sattāyaṃ bhavanaṃ gehe, lese tu khalite chalaṃ.
anya-e0809n0:3604_0: Veraṃ pāpe ca paṭighe, taco cammani vakkale;
anya-e0809n0:3607_0: Paṭihāre mukhe dvāraṃ, pete ñāte mato tisu;
anya-e0809n0:3608_0: Māso paraṇṇa kālesu, naggo tva’celakepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3610_0: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho, migādo chagale pasu;
anya-e0809n0:3611_0: Arūpe cā’vhaye nāmaṃ, daro daratha bhītisu.
anya-e0809n0:3621_0: Havi sappimhi hotabbe, siro seṭṭhe ca muddhani;
anya-e0809n0:3622_0: Vicārepi viveko tha, sikharī pabbate dume.
anya-e0809n0:3624_0: Vego jave pavāhe ca, saṅku tu khilahetisu;
anya-e0809n0:3625_0: Niggahīte kaṇe bindu, varāho sūkare gaje.
anya-e0809n0:3642_0: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullo khudde ca uddhane.
anya-e0809n0:3652_0: Sākhāyaṃ viṭapo thambhe, sattu khajjantare dise;
anya-e0809n0:3655_0: Rāge raṅgo naccaṭṭhāne, pānaṃ peyye ca pītiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3661_0: Palālo palāpo (ka.) 453-gāthā passitabbā tu bhusamhi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3663_0: Matā’vāṭe caye kāsu, panisā kāraṇe raho;
anya-e0809n0:3671_0: Dasā’ vatthā paṭantesu, kāraṇaṃ ghāta, hetusu.
anya-e0809n0:3673_0: Hatthidāne mado gabbe, ghaṭā ghaṭana rāsisu;
anya-e0809n0:3678_0: Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givā galepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3681_0: Bhaṅgo bhede paṭe bhaṅgaṃ, chattaṃ tu chavakepi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3683_0: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madano dume;
anya-e0809n0:3691_0: Khette vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī) vappo taṭepi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3696_0: Saṅghāto yugagehaṅge, khāro ūse ca bhasmani.
anya-e0809n0:3705_0: Abyayaṃ vuccate dāni, cirassaṃ tu ciraṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n0:3706_0: Cirena cirarattāya, saha saddhiṃ samaṃ amā.
anya-e0809n0:3709_0: Vajjane tu vinā nānā, antarena rite puthu.
anya-e0809n0:3711_0: Balavaṃ suṭṭhu cā’tīvā, tisaye kimuta sva’ti;
anya-e0809n0:3712_0: Aho tu kiṃ kimū’ dāhu, vikappe kimuto’da ca.
anya-e0809n0:3716_0: He hare tha kathaṃ kiṃsu, nanu kacci nu kiṃ samā.
anya-e0809n0:3719_0: Tagghe’ kaṃse sasakkañcā, ddhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have.
anya-e0809n0:3721_0: Yāvatā tāvatā yāva, tāva kittāvatā tathā;
anya-e0809n0:3724_0: Yathā tathā yatheve’vaṃ, yathānāma yathāhi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3725_0: Seyyathāpye’vamevaṃ, vā, tatheva ca yathāpi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3727_0: Evampi ca seyyathāpi, nāma yatharivā’pi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3730_0: Saṃ sāmañca sayaṃ cātha, āma sāhu lahū’pi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3735_0: Asākalye tu cana ci, nipphale tu mudhā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:3737_0: Kadāci jātu tulyā’tha, sabbato ca samantato;
anya-e0809n0:3738_0: Parito ca samantāpi, atha micchā musā bhave.
anya-e0809n0:3740_0: Nisedhe na anomā’laṃ, nahi cetu sace yadi;
anya-e0809n0:3744_0: Īsaṃ kiñci manaṃ appe, sahasā tu atakkite;
anya-e0809n0:3749_0: Taṅkhaṇe sajju sapadi, balakkāre pasayha ca.
anya-e0809n0:3751_0: Sudaṃ kho vo (ka.) assu yagghe ve,hā’dayo padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n0:3752_0: Antarena’ntarā anto, vassaṃ nūna ca nicchaye.
anya-e0809n0:3754_0: Ānande sañca diṭṭhā tha, virodhakathane nanu;
anya-e0809n0:3758_0: Nīcaṃ appe, mahatyu’ccaṃ, atha pāto page samā.
anya-e0809n0:3762_0: Bahiddhā bāhirā bāhye, sīghetu saṇikaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n0:3764_0: Atthaṃ adassane duṭṭhu, nindāyaṃ, vandane namo;
anya-e0809n0:3765_0: Sammā suṭṭhu pasaṃsāyaṃ, atho sattāya matthi ca.
anya-e0809n0:3769_0: Tato pare parasuve, hiyyotu divase gate.
anya-e0809n0:3771_0: Yattha yatra yahiṃcātha, tattha tatra tahiṃtahaṃ;
anya-e0809n0:3772_0: Atho uddhañca upari, heṭṭhā tu ca adho samā.
anya-e0809n0:3774_0: Codane iṅgha handā’tha, ārādūrā ca ārakā;
anya-e0809n0:3775_0: Parammukhā tu ca raho, sammukhā tvā’vi pātu ca.
anya-e0809n0:3778_0: Nidassane iti’tthañca, evaṃ, kicche kathañci ca.
anya-e0809n0:3782_0: Tiro tu tiriyaṃ cātha, kucchāyaṃ duṭṭhu ku’ccate.
anya-e0809n0:3784_0: Suvatthi āsiṭṭhatthamhi, nindāyaṃ tu dhī dhi (ka.) kathyate;
anya-e0809n0:3785_0: Kuhiñcanaṃ kuhiṃ kutra, kuttha kattha kahaṃ kva tha.
anya-e0809n0:3789_0: Kadā kudācanaṃ cātha, tadāni ca tadā samā.
anya-e0809n0:3794_0: Dassane tappare saṅge, pasaṃsā, gati, suddhisu;
anya-e0809n0:3807_0: Pātubhāve viyoge ca, nisedhādo ni dissati;
anya-e0809n0:3808_0: Atho nīharaṇe cevā, varaṇādo ca nī siyā.
anya-e0809n0:3810_0: Uddhakamma viyoga tta, lābha titti samiddhisu;
anya-e0809n0:3818_0: Sammā bhusa saha ppatthā, bhimukhatthesu saṅgate;
anya-e0809n0:3822_0: Viyoge kalahe pātu, bhāve bhāse ca kucchane.
anya-e0809n0:3825_0: Padhāna dakkhatā kheda, sahatthādo vi dissati.
anya-e0809n0:3827_0: Viyoge jānane cā’dho,bhāga nicchaya bhāga’nicchaya (bhāga+anicchaya-ṭī) suddhisu;
anya-e0809n0:3833_0: Dese lakkhaṇa vicche’ttha, mbhūta bhāgādike anu.
anya-e0809n0:3837_0: Soka byāpana tatvesu, lakkhaṇādo siyā pari.
anya-e0809n0:3850_0: Su sobhane sukhe sammā, bhusa suṭṭhu samiddhisu.
anya-e0809n0:3861_0: Sambhāvane ca garahā, pekkhāsu ca samuccaye;
anya-e0809n0:3864_0: Niddese vajjane pūjā, pagate vāraṇepi ca;
anya-e0809n0:3865_0: Padussane ca garahā, corikā’do siyā apa.
anya-e0809n0:3887_0: Pasaṃsāgarahāsaññā, sīkārādo svīkāra (ṭī.) pi nāma tha;
anya-e0809n0:3896_0: Pācī, pura, ṅgatotthesu, puratthā paṭhame pyatha;
anya-e0809n0:3909_0: Nu saṃsaye ca pañhe tha, nānā’ nekattha vajjane;
anya-e0809n0:3910_0: Kiṃ tu pucchājigucchāsu, kaṃ tu vārimhi muddhani.
anya-e0809n0:3912_0: Amā sahasamīpe tha, bhede appaṭhame puna;
anya-e0809n0:3915_0: Patīcī carime pacchā, sāmi tvaddhe jigucchane;
anya-e0809n0:3920_0: Bhiṃsāpane hiṃsāpane (ṭī.) dhī dhi (ka.) nindāyaṃ, pidhāne tiriyaṃ tiro.
anya-e0809n0:3922_0: Tuna tvāna tave tvā tuṃ, dhā so thā kkhattu, meva ca;
anya-e0809n0:3923_0: To tha tra hiñcanaṃ hiṃhaṃ, dhi ha hi dha dhunā rahi.
anya-e0809n0:3925_0: Dāni vodācanaṃ dājja, thaṃ tattaṃ jjha jju ādayo;
anya-e0809n0:3938_0: Iha yo kusalo matimā sa naro,
anya-e0809n0:3950_0: Kittiyā viya sambādhī, katā khettehi vāpihi.
